104a4(khri brgyad stong pa): dang gzugs dang / skye mched drug dang / reg pa dang / tshor ba dang / sred pa dang / len pa dang / srid pa dang / skye ba dang / rga shi yongs su rtogs par 'tshal bas
104a5(khri brgyad stong pa): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi'o/ / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug spang bar 'tshal bas/ shes
104a6(khri brgyad stong pa): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi'o/ / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jig tshogs la lta ba spong bar 'tshal ba dang / the tshom dang / tshul khrims dang
104a7(khri brgyad stong pa): brtul zhugs mchog tu 'dzin pa dang / 'dod pa'i 'dod chags dang / gnod sems spang bar 'tshal ba dang / 'dod pa'i 'dod chags dang / gzugs kyi 'dod chags dang
104b1(khri brgyad stong pa): gzugs med pa'i 'dod chags yongs su rtogs par 'tshal ba dang / kun tu sbyor ba dang / bag la nyal ba dang / kun nas ldang ba rnams spang 'tshal bas/ shes rab kyi pha rol
104b2(khri brgyad stong pa): tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi'o/ / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyor ba bzhi dang / chu bo bzhi dang / mdud pa bzhi dang / len pa bzhi da phyin ci
104b3(khri brgyad stong pa): log bzhi'i bar du spang bar 'tshal bas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi dge ba'i las kyi lam bcu spang bar
104b4(khri brgyad stong pa): 'tshal bas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi'o/ / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yongs su rtsoms par
104b5(khri brgyad stong pa): bar 'tshal bas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs pa brtse bar
104b6(khri brgyad stong pa): 'tshal bas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi'o/ / de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bzad pa'i
104b7(khri brgyad stong pa): pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs
105a1(khri brgyad stong pa): 'tshal bas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang
105a2(khri brgyad stong pa): gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang
105a3(khri brgyad stong pa): stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / mi 'jig pa bzhi dang / mngon pa
105a4(khri brgyad stong pa): shes pa drug dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yongs su rdzogs par bgyi bar 'tshal bas shes rab kyi pha rol tu
105a5(khri brgyad stong pa): phyin pa la bslab par bgyi'o/ / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub kyi yan lag yod pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug par 'tshal bas/ shes rab kyi pha
105a6(khri brgyad stong pa): rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi'o/ / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po seng ge rnam par rtse ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug par 'tshal ba dang / seng ge rnam par
105a7(khri brgyad stong pa): bsgyings pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug par 'tshal ba dang / gzugs kyi sgo dang ting nge 'dzin thams cad thob par 'tshal ba dang / dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin la
105b1(khri brgyad stong pa): snyoms par 'jug par 'tshal ba dang / rin chen phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin dang / zla ba'i 'od kyi ting 'dzin dang / zla ba'i rgyal mtshan tog gi ting nge 'dzin dang chos thams ca
105b2(khri brgyad stong pa): kyi phyag rgyar gyur pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / kun tu lta ba'i phyag rgya'i ting 'dzin dang / chos kyi dbyings su nges pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nges pa'i rgyal mtshan dang nge 'dzim d
105b3(khri brgyad stong pa): ang rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad la 'jug pa'i sgo'i ting nge 'dzin dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rgyal po'i phyag rgya'i ting
105b4(khri brgyad stong pa): 'dzin dang / dpung bkod pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / yang dag par 'phags pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad kyi nges pa'i tshig la gdon mi za bar 'jug pa'i ting nge 'dzin
105b5(khri brgyad stong pa): dang / chos thams cad shes pa'i bzod pa la 'jug pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / phyogs bcur rnam par lta ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad kyi gzungs kyi sgo'i phyag rgya'i
105b6(khri brgyad stong pa): ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad brjed pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad yang dag par 'du ba'i rnam pa'i phyag rgya'i ting 'dzin dang / nam mkha'i gnas la
105b7(khri brgyad stong pa): gnas pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / mngon par shes pa mi nyams pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / snod du gyur pa'i dang nge 'dzin dang / rgya
106a1(khri brgyad stong pa): mtshan gyi rtse mo'i dpung rgyan gyi ting nge 'dzin dang / nyon mongs pa thams cad nges par sreg pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / bdud bzhi'i dpung stobs med par byed
106a2(khri brgyad stong pa): pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / ye shes sgron ma'i ting nge 'dzin dang / stobs bcu'i stobs kyis 'phags pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nam mkha' ltar chags pa med pas rnam par
106a3(khri brgyad stong pa): grol zhing gos pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug par 'tshal bas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
106a4(khri brgyad stong pa): chen po ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo de dag dang / gzhan dag kyang thob par 'tshal bas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi'o// // shes rab tu
106a5(khri brgyad stong pa): pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa las bam po drug pa/ / // bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa
106a6(khri brgyad stong pa): yongs su rdzogs par bgyi bar 'tshal bas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
106a7(khri brgyad stong pa): dge ba'i rtsa ba gang dag yongs su rdzogs pas ngan song rnams su mi ltung ba dang / rigs dma' 'a rnams su mi skye ba dang / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sar mi ltung ba dang /
106b1(khri brgyad stong pa): byang chub sems dpa'i skyon gyi spyi gtsug tu mi ltung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyi bar 'tshal bas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ba
106b2(khri brgyad stong pa): bgyi'o/ / de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chu
106b3(khri brgyad stong pa): gyi spyi gtsug tu ltung ba yin/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs la mi mkhas pas pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod cing
106b4(khri brgyad stong pa): thabs la mi mkhas pas stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la brten te/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yang mi ltung la rkang
106b5(khri brgyad stong pa): sems dpa'i skyon med par yang mi 'jug pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i skyon zhes bya'o/ / shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir 'di byang chub sems dpa'
106b6(khri brgyad stong pa): sems dpa' chen po'i skyon du 'gyur/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i skyon zhes bya ba ni/ 'di lta ste/ chos la sred
106b7(khri brgyad stong pa): pa'o/ / shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor chos la sred pa gang yin/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems
107a1(khri brgyad stong pa): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni/ gzugs la stong zhes bya bar mngon par zhen cing gnas te kun tu shes pa dang / de bzhin du tshor ba dang /
107a2(khri brgyad stong pa): 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la stong zhes bya bar mngon par zhen cing gnas te kun tu shes pa de ni/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
107a3(khri brgyad stong pa): po'i 'thun pa'i chos la sred pa ste skyon zhes bya'o/ / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' gzugs la mi rtag ces bya bar mngon par zhen cing gnas te kun tu shes
107a4(khri brgyad stong pa): pa dang / gzugs sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag med pa dang / mi sdug pa dang / zhi ba dang / stong pa dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa zhes bya bar mngon par zhen cing
107a5(khri brgyad stong pa): gnas te kun tu shes pa de ni/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa'i 'thun pa'i chos la sred pa ste skyon no// de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang /
107a6(khri brgyad stong pa): rnam par shes pa la mi rtag ces bya bar mngon par zhen cing gnas te kun shes pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag med pa dang / mi sdug pa dang / zhi ba dang / stong pa dang / mtshan
107a7(khri brgyad stong pa): ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa zhes bya bar mngon par zhen cing gnas te kun tu shes pa de ni tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rjes su 'thun
107b1(khri brgyad stong pa): pa'i chos la sred pa ste skyon no/ / gal te 'di ltar gzugs spang bar bya'o// 'dis gzugs spang bar bya'o// 'di ltar tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang/
107b2(khri brgyad stong pa): rnam par shes pa spang bar bya'o// 'dis spang bar bya'o// 'di ltar sdug bsngal yongs su shes par bya'o// 'dis sdug bsngal yangs su shes par bya'o// 'di ltar kun 'byung ba spang bar
107b3(khri brgyad stong pa): bya'o/ / 'dis kun 'byung ba spang bar bya'o// 'di ltar 'gog pa mngon sum du bya'o// 'dis 'gog pa mngon sum du bya'o// 'di ltar lam bsgom par bya'o// 'dis lam bsgom par bya'o//
107b4(khri brgyad stong pa): 'di ni kun nas nyon mongs pa'o// 'di ni rnam par byang ba'o// chos 'di dag ni bsten par bya'o// chos 'di dag ni bsten par mi bya'o// 'di la ni byang chub sems dpas spyad par
107b5(khri brgyad stong pa): bya'o/ / 'di la ni sprad par mi bya'o// 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i lam mo// 'di ni lam ma yin no// 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa'o// 'di ni bslab pa ma yin no//
107b6(khri brgyad stong pa): 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// 'di ni tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
107b7(khri brgyad stong pa): pa'o/ / 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no/
108a1(khri brgyad stong pa): 'din byang chub sems dpa'i thabs la mkhas pa'o// 'di ni thabs la mkhas pa ma yin no// 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med pa'o// 'di ni skyon no zhes bya/
108a2(khri brgyad stong pa): bar chos de dag la mngon par zhen cing gnas te/ kun tu shes pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'thun pa'i chos la sred pa ste skyon no// shA ri'i bus smras
108a3(khri brgyad stong pa): pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i skyon med pa gang yin/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems
108a4(khri brgyad stong pa): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/ nang stong pa nyid la phyi stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / phyi stong pa nyid la nang stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
108a5(khri brgyad stong pa): byi nang stong pa nyid la stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la phyi nang stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la chen po stong
108a6(khri brgyad stong pa): pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mthong chen po stong pa nyid la stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / chen po stong pa nyid la don dam pa stong pa nyid yang dag
108a7(khri brgyad stong pa): bapar rjes su mi mthong / don dam pa stong pa nyid la chen po stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / don dam pa stong pa nyid la 'dus byas stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong
108b1(khri brgyad stong pa): 'dus byas stong pa nyid la don dam pa stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / 'dus byas stong pa nyid la 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / 'dus ma byas stong
108b2(khri brgyad stong pa): pa nyid la 'dus byas stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong
108b3(khri brgyad stong pa): pa nyid la 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la dor ba med stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid
108b4(khri brgyad stong pa): la thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / rang bzhin gyis stong
108b5(khri brgyad stong pa): pa nyid la dor ba med pa stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid la rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa'i/
108b6(khri brgyad stong pa): la rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la chos thams cad stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / chos thams cad stong pa nyid la
108b7(khri brgyad stong pa): rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / chos thams cad stong pa nyid la dngos po med pa stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la
109a1(khri brgyad stong pa): chos thams cad stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la
109a2(khri brgyad stong pa): dngos po med pa stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong
109a3(khri brgyad stong pa): pa nyid la ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod na/ byang
109a4(khri brgyad stong pa): chub sems dpa'i skyon med pa la 'jug pa yin no/ / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de la de ltar slob
109a5(khri brgyad stong pa): pas gzugs shes par bya ste/ des rlom sems su'ang mi bya'o// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa shes par bya ste/ des rlom sems su'ang
109a6(khri brgyad stong pa): mi bya'o/ / mig dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yod shes par bya ste/ des rlom sems su'ang mi bya'o// gzugs dang / smra dang / dri dang
109a7(khri brgyad stong pa): ro dang / reg bya dang / chos rnams shes par bya ste/ des rlom sems su'ang mi bya'o// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa shes par bya ste/ des rlom sems su'ang mi bya'o// tshul
109b1(khri brgyad stong pa): khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shes par bya ste/ de dag gis rlom sems su'ang mi bya'o// bsam gtan
109b2(khri brgyad stong pa): dang tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams shes par bya ste/ de dag gis rlom sems su'ang mi bya'o// de bzhin du mngon par shes pa lnga dang / mig lnga
109b3(khri brgyad stong pa): dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang / yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam dang / mi
109b4(khri brgyad stong pa): 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad po dag shes par bya ste/ de dag gis rlom sems su'ang mi bya'o// tshe dang
109b5(khri brgyad stong pa): ldan pa shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pas/ byang chub kyi sems des kyang rlom sems su'ang mi bya'o// mi mnyam
109b6(khri brgyad stong pa): pa dang mnyam pa'i sems dang rlabs po che'i sems kyis kyang rlom sems su'ang mi bya'o/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar sems de sems ma yin te/ sems kyi rang bzhin 'od gsal ba'i
109b7(khri brgyad stong pa): phyir ro/ / shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor sems kyi rang bzhin 'od gsal ba gang yin/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu sems gang 'dod chags
110a1(khri brgyad stong pa): dang ldan pa'ang ma yin/ bral ba rang ma yin/ zhe sdang dang gti mug dang ldan pa'ang ma yin/ bral ba'ang ma yin no// kun nas ldang ba rnams dang / sgrib
110a2(khri brgyad stong pa): pa rnams dang / bag la nyal ba rnams dang / kun tu sbyor ba rnams dang / lta bar gyur pa rnams dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sems rnams dang ldan pa'ang ma yin/ bral
110a3(khri brgyad stong pa): b.rang ma yin pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems kyi rang bzhin 'od gsal ba'o// shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan rab
110a4(khri brgyad stong pa): 'byor sems gang la sems ma yin no zhes bya ba'i sems de yod dam/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu ci gang sems ma yin pa de la yod pa'am/ med pa
110a5(khri brgyad stong pa): dmigs pa yod par 'gyur ram/ shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de ni med do// rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gal te sems ma yin pa de
110a6(khri brgyad stong pa): la yod pa'am med pa med cing mi dmigs na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu khyod kyis 'di skad smras te/ sems gang la sems ma yin zhes bya ba'i sems de yod dam zhes bya/ brgal zhing
110a7(khri brgyad stong pa): brtag pa 'di jig rigs sam/ shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor sems ma yin pa de gang yin/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu sems ma
110b1(khri brgyad stong pa): yin pa ni 'gyur ba med cing rnam par mi rtog pa ste/ de ni chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid de/ 'di ni sems ma yin pa bsam gyis mi khyam pa zhes bya'o// shA rir dus
110b2(khri brgyad stong pa): smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ji ltar sems 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa de bzhin du gzugs kyang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa yin nam/ de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes
110b3(khri brgyad stong pa): dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'ang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa yin nam/ ji ltar sems la 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa de bzhin du mig gi khams
110b4(khri brgyad stong pa): dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med dam/ de bzhin du rna ba'i khams dang / sna'i khams dang / lce'i khams
110b5(khri brgyad stong pa): dang / lus kyi khams dang / yid kyi khams dang / chos kyi khams dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med dam/ de bzhin du skye mched
110b6(khri brgyad stong pa): rnams dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dang / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang / yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul
110b7(khri brgyad stong pa): gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / stobs dang / sangs rgyas kyi
111a1(khri brgyad stong pa): chos ma 'dres pa dang / blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bar yang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pazhin nam/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/
111a2(khri brgyad stong pa): dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de de bzhin te/ ji ltar sems 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa de bzhin du phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang
111a3(khri brgyad stong pa): pha rol tu phyin pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang / stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa dang / blan
111a4(khri brgyad stong pa): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bar yang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med do/ / shA r-i'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor legs so legs so// 'di lta
111a5(khri brgyad stong pa): khyod ni bcom ldan 'das kyi sras thugs las skyes pa/ zhal nas skyes pa/ chos las skyes pa/ chos kyis sprul pa/ chos kyi bgo skal la spyod pa/ zang zing gi bgro skal la spyod
111a6(khri brgyad stong pa): pa ma yin pa/ chos rnams la mngon sum gyi mig dang ldan pa/ lus mngon sum du gyur pa ste/ nyan thos nyon mongs pa med par gnas pa rnams kyi mchog tu bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs
111a7(khri brgyad stong pa): bstan pa 'di'ang dang 'dra'o/ / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos kyang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar bslab par bya'o// byang chub
111b1(khri brgyad stong pa): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyir mi ldog pa'ang 'di las su shes par bya'o/ / de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ma bral bar
111b2(khri brgyad stong pa): shes par bya'o/ / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyan thos kyi sa la slob par 'dod pas kyang bsgrims te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid mnyan par
111b3(khri brgyad stong pa): bya/ gzung bar bya/ bcang bar bya/ bklag par bya// kun chub par bya/ tshul bzhin du yid la bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rang sangs rgyas kyis dang / byang chub
111b4(khri brgyad stong pa): sems dpa'i sa dang / sangs rgyas kyi sa la slob par 'dod pas kyang bsgribs te shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid mnyan par bya/ gzung bar bya/ bcang bar bya/ bklag par bya

111b6(khri brgyad stong pa): sems dpa' dang / sangs rgyas kyi sa gang dag la bslab par bya ba'i theg pa gsum po dag/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las rgya cher bstan pa'i phyir ro// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
111b7(khri brgyad stong pa): pa khri brgyad spong ba las/ skyon med pa la 'jug pa'i le'u zhes bya ste bdun pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces
112a1(khri brgyad stong pa): gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das bdag gis byang chub sems dpa' dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma 'tshal// ma dmigs/ yang dag par rjes su ma
112a2(khri brgyad stong pa): mthong na/ byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang la gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis dngos po ma 'tshal/ ma dmigs/
112a3(khri brgyad stong pa): yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ste/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis dngos po ma 'tshal/ ma dmigs/ yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bzhin du/ chos gang gis chos gang la gdams
112a4(khri brgyad stong pa): shing rjes su bstan par bgyi ste/ 'di nyid bdag gi 'gyod par 'gyur lags so// bcom ldan 'di ltar bdag gis chos thams cad ma 'tshal// ma dmigs/ yang dag par rjes su ma
112a5(khri brgyad stong pa): mthong na/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bgyi ba 'am/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bgyi ba'i ming tsam gyis ji ltar 'phel ba dang 'grib par bgyis te/ 'di nyid bdag gi
112a6(khri brgyad stong pa): 'gyod par 'gyur lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das mi de'ang gnas pa ma mchis/ thug pa ma mchis pa lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ ming de ma mchis pas de ltar na ming de/
112a7(khri brgyad stong pa): gnas pa ma mchis/ thug pa ma mchis pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis gzugs kyi 'phel ba dang / 'grib pa ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong / bcom
112b1(khri brgyad stong pa): lda 'das bdag gis tsho pa dang / 'dugs dang / 'du byad rnams dang / rnam ba gas pa'i 'phel ba dang / 'chib pa dang migs yang dasmra bar rjes su ma mthong na/ byung
112b2(khri brgyad stong pa): sems dpa' zhes gang la ming du ga dgas par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na ming de rang gnas pa ma mchis/ thug pa ma mchis pa lags so// de ci'i slad du zhen
112b3(khri brgyad stong pa): ming de ma mchis pas de ltar na ming de gnas pa ma mchis/ thug pa ma mchis pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis mig gi 'phel ba dang / 'grib pa ma dmigs yang dag

112b6(khri brgyad stong pa): zhes ji ltar ming du gdags par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das gzugs kyi ming dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dang / mig dang / rnab
112b7(khri brgyad stong pa): dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi ming de dag ni gnas pa ma mchis// thug pa ma mchis pa lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ ming de dag ma mchis pas/ de ltar ming
113a1(khri brgyad stong pa): de gnas pas mchis/ thug pa ma mchis pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis mig gi rnam par shes pa'i 'phel pa dang / 'grib pa ma dmigs yang
113a2(khri brgyad stong pa): dag par rjes su ma mthong / bcom ldan 'das bdag gis rna ba dang / sna dang / lde dang / lus dang / yid kyi 'phel ba dang / 'grig pa ma dmigs yang dag par rjes sum mthong ste/

113a4(khri brgyad stong pa): du ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' zhes ming du gdags par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das ming gang lags pa de'ang gnas pa ma mchis/ thug pa ma mchis pa lags so// de ci'i slad du
113a5(khri brgyad stong pa): zhe na/ ming de ma mchis pas/ de ltar na ming de gnas pa ma mchis/ thug pa ma mchis pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis mig gi 'dus te reg pa dang / rna ba
113a6(khri brgyad stong pa): dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'phel ba dang / 'grib pa ma dmigs yang dag par par rjes
113a7(khri brgyad stong pa): su ma mthong / bcom ldan 'das bdag gis rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'phel ba dang / 'grib pa ma dmigs
113b1(khri brgyad stong pa): yang dag par rjes su ma mthong / bcom ldan 'das bdag gis sa'i khams kyi 'phel ba dang / 'grib pa ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong / bcom ldan 'das bdag gis
113b2(khri brgyad stong pa): chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams dang / nam mkha'i khams dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi 'phel ba dang / 'grib pa ma dmigs yang dag par rjes
113b3(khri brgyad stong pa): su ma mthong / bcom ldan 'das bdag gis ma rig pa'i 'phel ba dang / 'grib pa ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong / bcom ldan 'das bdag gis 'du byed rnams dang /
113b4(khri brgyad stong pa): rnam par shes pa dang / ming dang gzugs dang / skye mched drug dang / reg pa dang / tsher ba dang / sred pa dang / len pa dang / srid pa dang / skye ba dang / rga shi'i 'phel
113b5(khri brgyad stong pa): ba dang / 'grib pa ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong / bcom ldan 'das bdag gis 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug gi 'phel ba dang / 'grib pa ma dmigs yang dag
113b6(khri brgyad stong pa): par rjes su ma mthong / bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kun nas ldang ba rnams dang / sgrib rnams dang / bag la nyal ba rnams dang / kun tu sbyor ba rnams kyi 'phel ba dang / 'grib pa ma dmigs
113b7(khri brgyad stong pa): yang dag par rjes su ma mthong / bcom ldan 'das bdag gis lta ba'i rnam pa drug cu rtsa gnyis kyi 'phel ba dang / 'grib pa ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong / bcom ldan
114a1(khri brgyad stong pa): 'das bdag gis bdag gi 'phel ba dang / 'grib pa ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong / bcom ldan 'das bdag gis sems can dang / srog dang /

115a1(khri brgyad stong pa): de ltar na ming de gnas pa ma mchis/ thug pa ma mchis pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis rmi lam lta bu'i nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga po dag gi phel ba

120b2(khri brgyad stong pa): ldan 'das 'di ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas stong ste/ bcom ldan 'das sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin

120b4(khri brgyad stong pa): phyin pa lags pa'i slad du'o/ / de bzhin du tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha
120b5(khri brgyad stong pa): rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas par mi bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu bla ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas stong ste/
120b6(khri brgyad stong pa): bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma lags la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ shes rab kyi

121a1(khri brgyad stong pa): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/ shes rab kyi rol tu phyin pa la gnas par mi bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byung
121a2(khri brgyad stong pa): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/ yi ge rnams la gnas par mi bgyi'o// yi ge mngon par bsgrub pa rnams la gnas par mi bgyi'o// /

121b1(khri brgyad stong pa): ldan 'das 'di ltar gzugs mi rtag pa ni gzugs mi rtag pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong ste/ mi rtag pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de mi rtag pa nyid ma lags la/ stong pa nyid las gud na'ang

126b7(khri brgyad stong pa): shes pa de yang dag pa'i mtha'i bar gyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong / / shes pa de yang dag pa'i phyi rol tu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong / phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi slad du shes pa de yang
127a1(khri brgyad stong pa): dgra pa'i mtha' las gzhan du'ang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba'i slad du'o/ / rnam grangs 'di la kun tu rgyu bzo sbyangs mos par gyur te/ de 'drir mos na sa dang /
127a2(khri brgyad stong pa): pas rjes su 'brang bas chos nyid tshad mar bgyi ste/ chos thams cad mi dmigs pa'i slad du rnam pa'i slad du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes la zhugs par gyur te/ de de ltar mos nas
127a3(khri brgyad stong pa): des chos gang yang mtshan ma mchis par yid la bgyid pa'i slad du/ chos gang yang yongs su gzung ba ma mchis lags so// chos thams cad gzung du ma mchis pa dang / gtang du ma ma
127a4(khri brgyad stong pa): pa'i slad du des gang yongs su gzung bar bgyi ba 'am/ gtang bar bgyi ba'i chos gang yang ma dmigs te/ chos thams cad la rlom sems ma mchis pa'i slad du/ de ni mya ngan las 'das
127a5(khri brgyad stong pa): pas kyang rlom sems su 'gyur ba ma mchis lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad yongs su gzung ba ma mchis pa'i slad du/ gang gzugs yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / tshor ba
127a6(khri brgyad stong pa): dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / chos thams cad yongs su gzung ba ma mchis pa'i slad du/ yang dag pa'i mtha'i bar
127a7(khri brgyad stong pa): du yongs su mi 'dzin pa de ni gzhan gyi pha rol tu mchis pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lags so// de ni smon lam dag yongs
127b1(khri brgyad stong pa): sum rdzogs shing / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dag yongs su ma rdzogs kyi bA ra dra bar mdor yongs su mya ngan las mi 'dra' lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ smon ldan
127b2(khri brgyad stong pa): de dag smon lam ma lags/ stobs de dag stobs ma lags/ mi 'jigs pa de dag mi 'jigs pa ma lags/ so so yang dag par rig pa de dag so so yang dag par rig pa ma legs shing
127b3(khri brgyad stong pa): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi bar du sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ma lags te/ de dgra ni chos kyang ma lags/ chos ma lags pa'ang ma lags pa'i slad du'o//
127b4(khri brgyad stong pa): bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad yongs su gzung ba ma mchis pa'i slad du/ gang gzugs yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / yang dag pa'i mtha'i bar du yongs su mi 'dzin pa de ni gzhan gyi pha
127b5(khri brgyad stong pa): rol tu mchis pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lags so// // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong
127b6(khri brgyad stong pa): babam po bdun pa/ / / bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas 'di ltar yongs su brtag par
127b7(khri brgyad stong pa): bgyi ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni gang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu 'di ni gang gi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni ci'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni ci/
128a1(khri brgyad stong pa): zhig nA zhes yongs su brtag par bgyi'o// de de ltar yongs su rtog cing / de ltar nges par sems pa'i tshe/ gal te chos ma mchis shing mi dmigs pa gang lugs
128a2(khri brgyad stong pa): pa de/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lags par yang dag par rjes su mthong na/ de legs par mthong ba lags te/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar chos thams cad ni ma dmigs shing
128a3(khri brgyad stong pa): dmigs pa'i slad du'o/ / de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor chos gang dag med
128a4(khri brgyad stong pa): cing mi dmigs pa yin/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen
128a5(khri brgyad stong pa): po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med
128a6(khri brgyad stong pa): pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang /
128a7(khri brgyad stong pa): dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyi tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med cing mi dmigs so//
128b1(khri brgyad stong pa): bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu
128b2(khri brgyad stong pa): phyin pa med cing mi dmigs so/ / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu nang stong pa nyid kyang med cing mi dmigs so// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar yung med
128b3(khri brgyad stong pa): cing mi dmigs so/ / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi phyir/ gzugs med cing mi dmigs so// tshe dang
128b4(khri brgyad stong pa): ldan pa shA ri'i bu tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa med cing mi dmigs so// byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun gyi bar du med cing mi
128b5(khri brgyad stong pa): dmigs so/ / mngon par shes pa med cing mi dmigs so// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar du med cing mi dmigs so// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de bzhin nyid med cing
128b6(khri brgyad stong pa): mi dmigs so/ / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos gnas pa nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha'i bar du med cing
128b7(khri brgyad stong pa): mi dmigs so/ / tshe dang ldan pa'i shA ri'i bu rgyun du zhugs pa'ang med cing mi dmigs so// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bri dgra bcom pa dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub se/
129a1(khri brgyad stong pa): dpa' dang / sangs rgyas kyi bar du'ang med cing mi dmigs so// nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi phyir/ thams cad
129a2(khri brgyad stong pa): shes pa nyid kyang med cing mi dmigs so/ / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid med cing mi dmigs so// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang med cing mi dmigs so//
129a3(khri brgyad stong pa): tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa gal te sems mi zhum mi 'gong la/ mi skrag mi dngang zhing dngang bar mi 'gyur na/
129a4(khri brgyad stong pa): byang chub sems dpa'i sems dpa' chen po de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ma bral bar rig par bya'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus/ tshe dang ldan pa
129a5(khri brgyad stong pa): rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so/ / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa tham cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ma bral bar rig par bya// rab
129a6(khri brgyad stong pa): 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzugs ni gzugs kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas
129a7(khri brgyad stong pa): de yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/ / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ni rnam par shes pa'i rong
129b1(khri brgyad stong pa): bzhin dang bral ba'o/ / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu
129b2(khri brgyad stong pa): phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni shes rab kyi
129b3(khri brgyad stong pa): pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba'o/ / de bzhin du sbyar te/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ni sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba'o//
129b4(khri brgyad stong pa): yang dag pa'i mtha' yang yang dag pa'i mtha'i rang bzhin dang bral ba'o// shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gzugs kyi rang bzhin ji lta bu yin/ tshor ba dang /
129b5(khri brgyad stong pa): 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin ji lta bu yin/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor yang dag pa'i mtha' bar du rang bzhin ji lta bu yin/ rab
129b6(khri brgyad stong pa): 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzugs kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i
129b7(khri brgyad stong pa): rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o/ / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu yang dag pa'i mtha' bar gyi rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam grangs des na 'di ltar gzugs ni
130a1(khri brgyad stong pa): gzugs kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba'o/ / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ni rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin dang bral
130a2(khri brgyad stong pa): ba'o/ / de bzhin du yang dag pa'i mtha'i bar ni yang dag pa'i mtha'i rang bzhin dang bral bar rig par bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang gzugs ni gzugs kyi mtshan
130a3(khri brgyad stong pa): nyid dang bral ba'o/ / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ni rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid dang bral ba'o// de bzhin du yang drag pa'i mtha'i bar ni yang dag
130a4(khri brgyad stong pa): pa'i mtha'i mtshan nyid dang bral ba'o/ / mtshan nyid kyang mtshan nyid kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba'o// mtshan nyid kyi rang bzhin yang mtshan nyid kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba'o// shA ri'i
130a5(khri brgyad stong pa): bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang bslab pa 'di la slob pa de rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ram/
130a6(khri brgyad stong pa): rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang bslab pa 'di la slob pa de ni rnam pa
130a7(khri brgyad stong pa): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di ltar chos thams cad ma skyes shing byung ba med pa'i phyir ro// shA ri 'bras smras pa/
130b1(khri brgyad stong pa): tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir chos thams cad ma skyes shing nges par 'byung ba med pa yin// rab 'byor gyis smras pa// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i brag zugs ni gzugs kyis stong ste/
130b2(khri brgyad stong pa): de la skye ba dang 'byung ba mi dmigs so// de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ni rnam par shes pas stong ste/ de la skye ba dang 'byung ba mi dmigs/
130b3(khri brgyad stong pa): so// de bzhin du yang dag pa'i mtha'a'i bar ni yang dag pa'i mtha'i stong ste/ de la skye ba dang 'byung ba mi dmigs so// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
130b4(khri brgyad stong pa): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub dang nye ba yin no/ / de ji lta ji ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub dang nye bar
130b5(khri brgyad stong pa): gyur pa de lta de ltar lus yongs su dag pa dang / ngag yongs su dag pa dang / sems yongs su dag pa dang / mtshan yongs su dag pa thob par 'gyur ro// byang chub
130b6(khri brgyad stong pa): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ji lta ji ltar lus yongs su dag pa dang / ngag yongs su dag pa dang / sems yongs su dag pa dang / mtshan yongs su dag pa 'thob par
130b7(khri brgyad stong pa): 'gyur ba de lta de ltar 'dod chags dang ldan pa'i sems mi skyed do/ / zhe sdang dang ldan pa dang / gti mug dang ldan pa dang / nga rgyal dang ldan pa dang / sgyu dang g.yo dang ldan pa
131a1(khri brgyad stong pa): dang / 'dog dang ser sna dang ldan pa dang / chags pa dang ldan pa dang / lta ba dang ldan pa'i sems mi skyed do// de 'dod rmugs dang ldan pa'i mi skyed cing /
131a2(khri brgyad stong pa): zhe sdang dang / gti mug dang / nga rgyal dang / sgyu dang / g.yo dang / phrag dog dang / ser sna dang / chags pa dang / lta ba dang ldan pa'i sems mi skyed pas/ nam sang ma'i
131a3(khri brgyad stong pa): mngal du mi skye zhing rtag par rgyun du rdzus te skye bar 'gyur ro/ / sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i ched ma gtogs par nam yang ngan song rnams su mi skye'o// de sems can rnam
131a4(khri brgyad stong pa): yongs su smin par byed la/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed cing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zheng du 'gro ste/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
131a5(khri brgyad stong pa): chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du nam yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro/ / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa'
131a6(khri brgyad stong pa): sems dpa' chen po yon tan dang phan yon de dag thob par 'dod pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol phyin pa 'di la brtson pa mi gtang bar spyad par bya ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu byang chub sem dpa'
131a7(khri brgyad stong pa): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub dang nye ba yin no// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa las kun
131b1(khri brgyad stong pa): tu rgyu bzo sbyangs kyi le'u zhes bya ste brgyad pa'o/ / // de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang
131b2(khri brgyad stong pa): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa gal te thabs la mi mkhas pas/ / gzugs la spyod na mtshan ma la spyod pa lags te/ shes rab kyi pha
131b3(khri brgyad stong pa): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ma lags so/ / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la spyod na mtshan ma la spyod pa lags te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
131b4(khri brgyad stong pa): pa la spyod pa ma lags so/ / gal te gzugs la rtag ces bgyi ba 'am/ mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan mo la spyod pa lags to// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ma lags so//
131b5(khri brgyad stong pa): tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la rtag ces bgyi ba'am/ mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod pa lags te/ shes rab kyi pha rol
131b6(khri brgyad stong pa): tu phyin pa la spyod pa ma lags so/ / gal te gzugs la bde zhes bgyi ba 'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na/ mtshan ma la spyod pa legs/ gal te tshor ba dang / 'du shes
131b7(khri brgyad stong pa): dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la bde zhes bgyi ba 'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod pa lags/ gal te gzugs la bdag ces bgyi ba 'am/
132a1(khri brgyad stong pa): bdag sa mchis shes dkyi bar spyod namatshan mal spyod pa lags/ gal te tshud pa dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed nurgyas dang / rnam par shes pa la 'dag ces/
132a2(khri brgyad stong pa): bgyi ba'am/ bdag ma mchis shes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod pa lags/ gal te gzugs la zhi zhes 'gyi ba 'am/ ma nyi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod pa lags
132a3(khri brgyad stong pa): gal te tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la zhi zhes bgyi ba 'am/ ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod pa lags/ gal te gzugs
132a4(khri brgyad stong pa): la dben zhes bgyi ba 'am/ mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod pa lags/ gal te tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'dra byed rnams dang // rnam par
132a5(khri brgyad stong pa): shes pa la dben zhes bgyi ba'am/ mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan pa la spyod pa lags te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das
132a6(khri brgyad stong pa): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa thabs la mi mkhas pas/ / gal te byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos su macu rtsa bdun la spyod na mtshan ma la
132a7(khri brgyad stong pa): spyod pa lags/ de bzhin du mngon par shes pa rnams dang / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang / mig lnga dang / stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas
132b1(khri brgyad stong pa): kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi bar dag la spyod na mtshan ma la spyod pa lags te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'
132b2(khri brgyad stong pa): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa gal te 'di snyam du bdag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do snyam du sems na dmigs pa la spyod pa lags te/ byang
132b3(khri brgyad stong pa): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni mtshan ma nyid la spyod pa lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gal te 'di snyam du gang de ltar spyod pa
132b4(khri brgyad stong pa): de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin/ de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sgom pa yin no snyam du sems na/ de mtshan ma nyid la spyod pa lags te/ de ni byang chub
132b5(khri brgyad stong pa): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i thebs la mi mkhas par rig par bgyi ba lags so/ / shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan par rab 'byor ci'i phyir 'di byang
132b6(khri brgyad stong pa): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i thabs la mi mkhas par rig par bya ba yin/ rab 'byor gyis spras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
132b7(khri brgyad stong pa): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa 'di ltar gzugs la gnas shing kun tu shes te mos/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes
133a1(khri brgyad stong pa): pa la gnas shing kun tu shes te mos na/ de gzugs mngon par 'du byed pa la spyod pa yin/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par
133a2(khri brgyad stong pa): shes pa mngon par 'du byed pa la spyod pa yin te/ de ni de'i skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang /
133a3(khri brgyad stong pa): yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa byed pa yin no zhes kho bo smra'o// gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa thabs la mi
133a4(khri brgyad stong pa): mkhas pas gal te mig la gnas shing kun tu shes te mos/ rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid la gnas shing kun tu shes te mos/ gzugs la gnas shing kun
133a5(khri brgyad stong pa): tu shes te mos/ sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya dang / chos la gnas shing kun tu shes te mos/ mig gi rnam par shes pa la gnas shing kun tu shes te mos/ rna ba'i rnam
133a6(khri brgyad stong pa): par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / mye'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa la gnas shing kun tu shes te mos
133a7(khri brgyad stong pa): gal te mig gi 'dus te reg pa la gnas shing kun tu shes te mos/ gal te rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa la gnas shing kun tu shes te mos/
133b1(khri brgyad stong pa): gal te mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis byung ba'i tshor ba bde ba 'am/ sdug bsngal ba lam/ sdug bsngal ba'ang ma yin/ de ba'ang ma yin pa la gnas shing kun tu shes te mos/
133b2(khri brgyad stong pa): gal te rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis byung ba'i tshor ba bde ba 'am/ sdug bsngal ba 'am/ sdug bsngal ba'ang ma yin/
133b3(khri brgyad stong pa): bde ba'ang ma yin pa la gnas shing kun tu shes te mos/ gal te byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun la gnas shing kun tu shes te pos mig lnga dang / mngon par shes pa
133b4(khri brgyad stong pa): drug dang / pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / de bzhin
133b5(khri brgyad stong pa): gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la gnas shing kun tu shes te mos/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la gnas shing kun tu shes te mos/ dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang sangs

139b7(khri brgyad stong pa): pa de ni/ sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan cing

140a2(khri brgyad stong pa): dag bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis kyang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de lung
140a3(khri brgyad stong pa): ston par rig par bya ste/ ting nge 'dzin de dag gis pa des ni ting nge 'dzin kyang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo // bdag ni snyoms par zhugs so// bdag ni snyoms par
140a4(khri brgyad stong pa): 'jug go/ / bdag ni snyoms par 'jug par 'gyur ro// zhes bya bar ting nge 'dzin des rlom sems su 'gyur ba'ang med de/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de la rnam
140a5(khri brgyad stong pa): par rtog pa de dag thams cad med cing mi 'byung ngo / / shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci ting nge 'dzin de dag la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la/

140a7(khri brgyad stong pa): phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang gzhan la/ ting nge 'dzin gyi gzhan zhing / byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan zhes bya ba med kyis/ byang chub sems dpa'
140b1(khri brgyad stong pa): nyid kyang ting nge 'dzin yin la/ ting nge 'dzin nyid kyang byang chub sems dpa' yin pa'i phyir ro// shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gal te chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi
140b2(khri brgyad stong pa): phyir ting nge 'dzin kyang gzhan ma yin la/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin// byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin la/ ting nge 'dzin kyang gzhan ma yin te/ ting nge
140b3(khri brgyad stong pa): nge 'dzin nyid kyang byang chub sems dpa' yin/ byang chub sems dpa' nyid kyang ting nge 'dzin yin na/ ting nge 'dzin bstan par nus sam/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i
140b4(khri brgyad stong pa): bu de ni ma yin no/ / shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor rigs kyi bu des ci ting nge 'dzin de dag kun tu shes sam/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu kun tu
140b5(khri brgyad stong pa): shes pa med do/ / shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ji ltar kun tu shes pa med/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu ji ltar rnam par rtog par mi byed pa ltar ro//

141a1(khri brgyad stong pa): kun tu mi shes/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu ting nge 'dzin de dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po med pa de nyid kyi phyir rnam par
141a2(khri brgyad stong pa): mi shes shing kun tu mi shes so/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ rab 'byor ji ltar ngas nyan thos nyon mongs pa med

141b1(khri brgyad stong pa): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar slob pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa yin te/ de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob po// de bzhin du bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa

142a2(khri brgyad stong pa): phyir sdug bsngal mi dmigs so/ / shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir kun 'byung ba dang / 'gog pa dang / lam mi dmigs so// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir 'dod pa'i khams dang /

146a7(khri brgyad stong pa): snyam mam/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan la/ spa dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya dang / chos rnams kyang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam sgyu ma'ang gzhan la/ mig gi rnam par shes pa'ang
146b1(khri brgyad stong pa): gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan la/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid
146b2(khri brgyad stong pa): kyi rnam par shes pa'ang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan la/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'ang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan la/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang
146b3(khri brgyad stong pa): sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'ang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom

149b6(khri brgyad stong pa): pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob par 'gyur snyam mam/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung bar 'gyur snyam mam/ rnam

151b6(khri brgyad stong pa): shing de dag ni phung po lnga po dag lags la de dag ni nang stong pa nyid kyis dmigs su ma mchis shing / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyis dmigs su ma mchis

152a1(khri brgyad stong pa): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bstan pa 'di thos na skrag ste dngang zhing dngang bar mi 'gyur lags grang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/

152b1(khri brgyad stong pa): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs la mkhas par rig par bya'o/ / rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
152b2(khri brgyad stong pa): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni/ / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis gzugs la sdug bsngal ba'i rnam pa dang / bdag med pa'i rnam
152b3(khri brgyad stong pa): pa dang / zhi ba'i rnam pa dang / stong pa'i rnam pa dang / mtshan ma med pa'i rnam pa dang / smon pa med pa'i rnam pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i rnam pa dang /

152b5(khri brgyad stong pa): dang / rnam par shes pa la sdug bsngal ba'i rnam pa dang / bdag med pa'i rnam pa dang / zhi ba'i rnam pa dang / stong pa'i rnam pa dang / mtshan ma med pa'i rnam pa dang / smon pa med
152b6(khri brgyad stong pa): pa'i rnam pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i rnam pa dang / dben pa'i rnam par so sor rtog ste/ de'ang mi dmigs so// rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'/
152b7(khri brgyad stong pa): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs la mkhas par rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab
153a1(khri brgyad stong pa): kyi pha rol tu phyiran pa la spyod pa ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis gzugs la mi rtag ces bya bar so sor rtog ste/
153a2(khri brgyad stong pa): de'ang mi dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la mi rtag ces
153a3(khri brgyad stong pa): bya bar so sor rtog ste/ de'ang mi dmigs so// rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs la mkhas pa yin no//
153a4(khri brgyad stong pa): rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i
153a5(khri brgyad stong pa): yid la bya ba dag gis gzugs la sdug bsngal zhes bya bar so sor rtog ste/ de'ang mi dmigs so// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang // rnam par shes pa la sdug
153a6(khri brgyad stong pa): bsngal zhes bya bar so sor rtog ste/ de'ang mi dmigs so// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang
153a7(khri brgyad stong pa): ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gos gzugs la bdag med ces bya bar so sor rtog ste/ / de'ang mi dmigs so// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la
153b1(khri brgyad stong pa): bdag med ces bya bar so sor rtog ste/ de'ang mi dmigs so// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang /
153b2(khri brgyad stong pa): ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis gzugs la zhi zhes bya bar so sor rtog ste/ de'ang mi dmigs so// tshor po dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la zhi zhes
153b3(khri brgyad stong pa): bya bar so sor rtog ste/ de'ang mi dmigs so// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni/ rnam pa
153b4(khri brgyad stong pa): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas gzugs la stong zhes bya bar so sor rtog ste/ de'ang mi dmigs so// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang
153b5(khri brgyad stong pa): rnam par shes pa la stong zhes bya bar so sor rtog ste/ de'ang mi dmigs so// gzugs la mtshan ma med ces bya bar so sor rtog ste/ de'ang mi dmigs so// tshor ba dang / 'du shes
153b6(khri brgyad stong pa): dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la mtshan ma med ces bya bar so sor rtog ste/ de'ang mi dmigs so// gzugs la smon pa med ces bya bar so sor rtog ste/ de'ang
153b7(khri brgyad stong pa): mi dmigs so/ / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang // 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la smon pa med ces bya bar so sor rtog ste/ de'ang mi dmigs so// gzugs la mngon
154a1(khri brgyad stong pa): par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar so sor rtog ste/ de'ang mi dmigs so// tshor pa dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la
154a2(khri brgyad stong pa): mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar so sor ste/ de'ang mi dmigs so// gzugs la dben zhes bya bar so sor rtog ste/ de'ang mi dmigs so// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang /
154a3(khri brgyad stong pa): 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la dben zhes bya bar so sor rtog ste/ de'ang mi dmigs so// rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab tu
154a4(khri brgyad stong pa): pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa'i thabs la mkhas pa yin no/ / rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de de ltar so sor rtog pa na 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gis sems can
154a5(khri brgyad stong pa): thams cad la gzugs mi rtag ces bya bar chos bstan par bya ste/ de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bya'o// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams/ rnam par shes pa
154a6(khri brgyad stong pa): mi rtag ces bya bar chos bstan par bya ste/ de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bya'o// gzugs sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong
154a7(khri brgyad stong pa): zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar chos bstan par bya ste/ de'ang mi dmigs
154b1(khri brgyad stong pa): pa'i tshul gyis bya'o/ / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba/ stong zhes
154b2(khri brgyad stong pa): bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar chos bstan par bya ste/ de'ang mi dmigs pa'i
154b3(khri brgyad stong pa): tshul gyis bya'o snyam du sems so/ / rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi
154b4(khri brgyad stong pa): skrag mi dngang zhing dngang bar mi 'gyur ro/ / rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa ma yin pa'i yid la
154b5(khri brgyad stong pa): bya ba dag gis gzugs mi rtag ces bya bar yid la byed de/ de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byed do// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa ma yin pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis tshor
154b6(khri brgyad stong pa): ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par she ba mi rtag ces bya bar yod la byed de/ de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byed do// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang
154b7(khri brgyad stong pa): ldan pa ma yin pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis gzugs sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byed do// rnam par shes pa'i bar du sdug bsngal zhes
155a1(khri brgyad stong pa): bya bang ya la byed de/ / de'ang mi dadags pa'i tshul gyis byed do// gzugs bdag med ces bya ba dang / gzugs ni zhes bya ba dang / gzugs stong
155a2(khri brgyad stong pa): zhes bya ba dang / gzugs mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / gzugs smon pa med ces bya ba dang / gzugs mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang / gzugs dben zhes bya bar
155a3(khri brgyad stong pa): yid la byed de/ de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byed do// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dag med ces bya ba dang / rnam par shes pa
155a4(khri brgyad stong pa): zhi zhes bya ba dang / rnam par shes pa stong zhes bya ba dang / rnam par shes pa mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / rnam par shes pa smon pa med ces bya ba dang / rnam par shes pa mngon
155a5(khri brgyad stong pa): par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang / rnam par shes pa dben zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byed do// rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
155a6(khri brgyad stong pa): po'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nag nog med pa ste/ des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi skrag mi dngang zhing dngang bar mi 'gyur ro// rab 'byor
155a7(khri brgyad stong pa): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na/ chos gang dag la mi rtag pa'i rnam pa dang / sdug bsngal ba'i rnam pa dang /
155b1(khri brgyad stong pa): bdag med pa'i rnam pa dang / zhi ba'i rnam pa dang / stong pa'i rnam pa dang / mtshan ma med pa'i rnam pa dang / smon pa med pa'i rnam pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i rnam pa
155b2(khri brgyad stong pa): dang / dben pa'i rnam par so sor rtog cing bzod la 'dod pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ste// des na byang chub sems dpa' sems
155b3(khri brgyad stong pa): dpa' chen po mi skrag mi dngang zhing dngang bar mi 'gyur ro/ / rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/
155b4(khri brgyad stong pa): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis gzugs mi rtag ces bya bar so sor rtog ste/ de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byed do// gzugs sdug bsngal
155b5(khri brgyad stong pa): zhes bya ba dang / gzugs bdag med ces bya ba dang / gzugs zhi zhes bya ba dang / gzugs stong zhes bya ba dang / gzugs mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / gzugs smon pa
155b6(khri brgyad stong pa): med ces bya ba dang / / gzugs mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang / gzugs dben zhes bya bar so sor rtog ste/ de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byed do// tshor ba dang /

156a1(khri brgyad stong pa): mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang / dben zhes byabar mom rtan cang / de' mi dmigs
156a2(khri brgyad stong pa): pa'i tshul gyis byed de/ de'i rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba rnams mi gtong zhing brtson pa mi 'dor ba gang yin pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
156a3(khri brgyad stong pa): dpa' chen po'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi skrag mi dngang zhing dngang bar mi 'gyur ro// rab 'byor
156a4(khri brgyad stong pa): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa gang gi tshe/ / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la byed pa dang ldan pa dang / de las
156a5(khri brgyad stong pa): gzhan pa mi dge ba'i chos gang byang chub kyi bar du gcod par byed pa de dag gi skabs mi 'byed po de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/
156a6(khri brgyad stong pa): rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni mi skrag mi dngang zhing dngang bar mi 'gyur ro// rab 'byor gzhan
156a7(khri brgyad stong pa): yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni 'di ltar so sor rtog ste/ gzugs kyi stong pa nyid kyis gzugs stong pa ma yin gyi
156b1(khri brgyad stong pa): gzugs nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ / stong pa nyid kyang gzugs so// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid kyis rnam par shes
156b2(khri brgyad stong pa): pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ rnam par shes pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'o// mig gi stong pa nyid kyis mig stong pa ma yin gyi/ mig nyid kyang stong pa nyid
156b3(khri brgyad stong pa): do/ / stong pa nyid kyang mig go// rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi stong pa nyid kyis yid stong pa ma yin gyi/ yid nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang yid do//
156b4(khri brgyad stong pa): gzugs kyi stong pa nyid kyis gzugs stong pa ma yin gyi/ gzugs nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang gzugs so// sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya dang
156b5(khri brgyad stong pa): chos kyi stong pa nyid kyis chos rnams stong pa ma yin gyi/ chos rnams kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang chos rnams so// mig gi rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid kyis mig gi
156b6(khri brgyad stong pa): rnam par shes pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ mig gi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang mig gi rnam par shes pa'o// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par
156b7(khri brgyad stong pa): shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid kyis yid kyi rnam par shes pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ yid kyi rnam par
157a1(khri brgyad stong pa): shes pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ / stong pa nyid kyang yid kyi rnam par shes pa'o// mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i stong pa nyid kyis mig gi 'dus te reg pa stong pa ma
157a2(khri brgyad stong pa): yin gyi/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang mig gi 'dus te reg pa'o// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang // sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lce'i
157a3(khri brgyad stong pa): 'dus te reg pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i stong pa nyid kyis yid kyi 'dus te reg pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang stong

157a5(khri brgyad stong pa): mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang
157a6(khri brgyad stong pa): sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i /
157a7(khri brgyad stong pa): gyis tshor ba'i stong pa nyid kyis yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa ma yin gyi/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang yid
157b1(khri brgyad stong pa): kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o/ / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi stong pa nyid kyis dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams stong pa ma yin gyi/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams
157b2(khri brgyad stong pa): nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ / stong pa nyid kyang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams so// yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs
157b3(khri brgyad stong pa): rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / lam gyi stong pa nyid kyis lam stong pa ma yin gyi/ lam nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang lam mo// stobs dang /
157b4(khri brgyad stong pa): mi 'jigs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi bar gyi stong pa nyid kyis sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams stong pa ma yin gyi/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams nyid kyang stong pa nyid do//
157b5(khri brgyad stong pa): stong pa nyid kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams te/ rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa'
157b6(khri brgyad stong pa): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs la mkhas pa yin te/ / thabs de dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bstan pa 'di thos nas ma
157b7(khri brgyad stong pa): skrag mi dngang zhing dngang bar mi 'gyur ro/ / rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das dge ba'i bshes gnyen gang dag gis yongs su zin na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
158a1(khri brgyad stong pa): phyin pa bstan pa 'di thos na mi skrag mi dngang zhing dngang bar mi 'gyur ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge pa'i bshes gnyen de dag gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/

158a4(khri brgyad stong pa): yongs su mi sngo ba dang / de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang // rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bya bar chos ston te/ de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston

159b4(khri brgyad stong pa): rab 'byor de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen du rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
159b5(khri brgyad stong pa): chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni gang dag de la mig gi rnam par shes pa dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mi rtag ces bya bar ston
159b6(khri brgyad stong pa): sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar
159b7(khri brgyad stong pa): chos ston te/ de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar long
160a1(khri brgyad stong pa): su mi sngo ba dang / de bzhin du rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / de bzhin du sna dang
160a2(khri brgyad stong pa): lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mi rtag ces bya bar ston/ sdug bsngal zhes
160a3(khri brgyad stong pa): bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar ston te/ de'ang
160a4(khri brgyad stong pa): mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su mi sngo ba ste/
160a5(khri brgyad stong pa): rab 'byor de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen du rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
160a6(khri brgyad stong pa): po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni gang dag de la dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams mi rtag ces bya bar chos ston te/ de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang
160a7(khri brgyad stong pa): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su mi sngo ba dang / de bzhin du yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa
160b1(khri brgyad stong pa): dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam mi rtag ces bya bar chos ston te/ de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang
160b2(khri brgyad stong pa): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su mi sngo ba dang / de bzhin du mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa
160b3(khri brgyad stong pa): rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams mi rtag ces bya bar chos ston te/ de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag
160b4(khri brgyad stong pa): kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su mi sngo ba ste/ rab 'byor de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems
160b5(khri brgyad stong pa): dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams te/ de dag gis yongs su zin pa ni bstan pa 'di thos nas mi skrag mi dngang zhing dngang bar mi 'gyur ro// rab 'byor gyis
160b6(khri brgyad stong pa): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/ thabs la mi mkhas pas sdib pa'i grogs po'i sug
160b7(khri brgyad stong pa): par mchis shing dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su spangs nas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa 'di thos na skrag sto dngang zhing dngang bar 'gyur ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das
161a1(khri brgyad stong pa): kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa rnam pa thams cad khyen pa nyid dang ldan
161a2(khri brgyad stong pa): pa'i yid la bya ba dag dang bral bas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom zhing dmigs te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa des kyang rlom sems su byed po dang // de bzhin du bsam gtan gyi pha rol
161a3(khri brgyad stong pa): tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa sgom zhing dmigs
161a4(khri brgyad stong pa): te/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa des kyang rlom sems su byed pa dang // rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
161a5(khri brgyad stong pa): spyod pa rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag dang bral bas gzugs nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ gzugs phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed// gzugs phyi/
161a6(khri brgyad stong pa): no stong pa zhes bya bar yid lo byed/ gzugs dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya ba'i bar du yid la byed/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa
161a7(khri brgyad stong pa): nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ rnam par shes pa phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ rnam par shes pa phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ rnam par shes pa dngos po med
161b1(khri brgyad stong pa): pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya ba'i bar du yid la byed cing / / nang stong pa nyid de'ang mi dmigs/ phyi stong pa nyid de'ang mi dmigs// phyi nang stong pa nyid de'ang mi dmigs// dngos po med
161b2(khri brgyad stong pa): pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar de'ang mi dmigs te/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rlom semasasu byed pa dang / mig nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ mig phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la
161b3(khri brgyad stong pa): byed/ mig phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ mig dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya ba'i bar du yid la byed cing / stong pa nyid de dag kyang dmigs te/ dmigs pa'i
161b4(khri brgyad stong pa): tshul gyis rlom sems su byed pa dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ yid phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ yid phyi nang
161b5(khri brgyad stong pa): stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ yid dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du yid la byed cing / stong pa nyid de dag kyang dmigs te/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rlom sems su byed

162a1(khri brgyad stong pa): te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la
162a2(khri brgyad stong pa): byed/ phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ces bya ba'i bar du yid la byed cing / stong pa nyid de dag kyang dmigs te/
162a3(khri brgyad stong pa): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rlom sems su byed pa dang / de bzhin du sbyar te/ ma rig pa dang / rga shi'i bar du nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/
162a4(khri brgyad stong pa): nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya ba'i bar du yid la byed cing / stong pa nyid de dag kyang dmigs te/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis de dag gis
162a5(khri brgyad stong pa): kyang rlom sems su byed pa dang / / rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan

162a7(khri brgyad stong pa): byed pa dang / de bzhin du yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan
162b1(khri brgyad stong pa): lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs
162b2(khri brgyad stong pa): rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dag sgom zhing de dag kyang dmigs te/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed pa ste/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa'
162b3(khri brgyad stong pa): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spod pa thabs la mi mkhas pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol phyin pa bstan pa 'di thos na skra ste dang zhing dngang bar 'gyur ro//
162b4(khri brgyad stong pa): rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sdig pa'i grogs po'i sug par mchis te/ sdig pa'i grogs
162b5(khri brgyad stong pa): po des yongs su zin pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa 'di thos na skrag ste dngang zhing dngang bar 'gyur ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor
162b6(khri brgyad stong pa): 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs po ni gang 'di skad du/ 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis
162b7(khri brgyad stong pa): gsungs pa ma yin gyis 'di la bslab par mi bya'o/ / 'di dag ni snyan dngags mkhan gyi rang bzo yin pas 'di dag ni mnyan par mi bya'o// gzung bar mi bya'o// kun chub
163a1(khri brgyad stong pa): par mi bya'o/ / bcang bar mi bya'o// bklag par mi bya'o// bsgom par mi bya'o// tshul bzhin du yid la mi bya'o// gzhan dag la'ang bstan par mi bya'o//
163a2(khri brgyad stong pa): zhes shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang 'bral bar byed/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang

163a5(khri brgyad stong pa): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du 'ongs nas 'di skad du/ rigs kyi bu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgoms pas khyod la ci zhig bya// bsam gtan

163a7(khri brgyad stong pa): kyi pha rol tu phyin pas khyod la ci zhig bya/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bsgoms pas khyod ci zhig bya zhes zer zhing 'bral bar byed do// zhes de la bdud kyi las rnams mi ston cing
163b1(khri brgyad stong pa): bdud kyi nyes pa dag mi rjod pa gang yin pa ste/ rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang

163b3(khri brgyad stong pa): du 'ongs nas/ nyan thos dang ldan pa'i mdo'i sde dang / dbangs kyis bsnyad pa'i sde dang / lung du bstan pa'i spyi dang / de lta bu byung ba'i sde dang / skes pa'i rabs kyi sde dang
163b4(khri brgyad stong pa): gleng gzhi'i sde dang / rtogs pa brjod pa'i sde dag ston par byed// rab tu ston par byed/ rnam par 'byed par byed/ gsal bar byed/ yang dag par rab tu ston par byed cing /
