163b7(khri brgyad stong pa): cing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du 'ongs nas/ 'di skad du rigs kyi bu khyod la ni byang chub kyi sems cung zad kyang med do// khyod ni phyir mi ldog pa'ang ma yin no//

164a2(khri brgyad stong pa): pa mi rjod mi ston pa gang yin pa de/ rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang bdud

165b7(khri brgyad stong pa): med par 'khor ba na 'khor zhing lag pa gcod pa dang / rkang pa gcad pa dang / mgo gcad pa dpag tu med pa dag nyams su myong bar 'gyur zhing / bla na med pa ma
166a1(khri brgyad stong pa): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pas khyod la ci zhig bya/ gang la rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byar yod pa de la
166a2(khri brgyad stong pa): brtson par gyis shig/ gang la dgra bcom pa nyid kyi 'bras bu mngon sum du byar yod pa de la brtson par gyis shig ces zer ba'i bdud kyi las de lta bu de dag mi rjod mi ston pa gang yin pa de ni/

166a5(khri brgyad stong pa): med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang /

173a2(khri brgyad stong pa): zag pa med pa dang / 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas dang / kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa dang / kha na ma tho ba med pa dang / thun mong dang / thun mong ma yin pa dag go// rab 'byor
173a3(khri brgyad stong pa): de dag ni chos thams cad ces bya ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos de dag gi med pa nyid la bslab par bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos
173a4(khri brgyad stong pa): chos thams cad khong du chud par bya ba'ang de dag yin no/ / / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa bam po dgu pa// rab 'byor/
173a5(khri brgyad stong pa): gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten pa'i dge ba'i chos rnams gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' sprul pa/ 'jig rten pa'i dge ba'i chos rnams shes bya ba
173a6(khri brgyad stong pa): ni/ phar 'dzin pa dang / mar 'dzin pa dang / dge sbyong du 'dzin pa dang / bram zer 'dzin pa dang / rigs kyi gtso bo la rim gro byed pa dang / sbyin pa las byang ba'i bsod nams bya
173a7(khri brgyad stong pa): ba'i dngos po dang / tshul khrims las byung ba dang / bsgom pa las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po dang / zhal ta byed pa dang ldan pa dang / thabs la mkhas pa dang /
173b1(khri brgyad stong pa): dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams dang / 'jig rten pa'i rnam par bam pa'i 'du shes dang / rnam par rnags pa'i 'du shes dang / rnam par 'bus gzhigs pa'i 'du shes dang
173b2(khri brgyad stong pa): rnam par dmar ba'i 'du shes dang / rnam par bsngos pa'i 'du shes dang / rnam par zos pa'i 'du shes dang // rnam par 'thor ba'i 'du shes dang // rus gong gi 'du shes dang / rnam
173b3(khri brgyad stong pa): par tshig pa'i 'du shes dang / / 'jig rten pa'i bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / 'jig rten pa'i sangs rgyas rjes su
173b4(khri brgyad stong pa): dran pa dang / chos rjes su dran pa dang / dge 'dun rjes su dran pa dang // tshul khrims rjes su dran pa dang // gtong ba rjes su dran pa dang / lha rjes su dran pa dang / dbugs 'byung
173b5(khri brgyad stong pa): ba dang rngub pa rjes su dran pa dang / 'chi ba rjes su dran pa dang / lus su gtogs pa rjes su dran pa dang / skyo ba rjes su dran pa ste/ rab 'byor de dag ni 'jig rten pa'i dge ba'i
173b6(khri brgyad stong pa): chos rnams shes bya'o/ / rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten pa'i chos mi dge ba rnams gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
173b7(khri brgyad stong pa): stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'jig rten pa'i chos mi dge ba ni srog gcod pa dang / ma byin par len pa dang / 'dod pas log par g.yem pa dang / brdzun du smra ba dang / phra ma dang /
174a1(khri brgyad stong pa): ngag rtsub po dang / tshig 'khyal pa dang / brnab sems dang / gnod sems dang / log par lta ba dang / khro ba dang / khon du 'dzin pa dang / 'chab pa dang / 'tshig pa dang /
174a2(khri brgyad stong pa): rnam par 'tshe ba dang / phrag dog dang / ser sna dang / nga rgyal te/ rab 'byor de dag ni 'jig rten pa'i chos mi dge ba rnams shes par bya'o// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/
174a3(khri brgyad stong pa): bcom ldan 'das lung du ma bstan pa'i chos rnams gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lus kyi las ni lung du ma bstan pa'o// ngag gi las ni lung du bstan
174a4(khri brgyad stong pa): pa'o/ / yid kyi las ni lung du ma bstan pa'o// 'byung ba chen po bzhi ni lung du ma bstan pa'o// dbang po lnga ni lung du ma bstan pa'o// skye mched drug ni lung du ma bstan pa'o//
174a5(khri brgyad stong pa): gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi ni lung du ma bstan pa'o// phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched rnams ni lung du ma bstan pa'o// rnam par smin pa ni lung du ma
174a6(khri brgyad stong pa): bstan pa ste/ rab 'byor 'di dag ni lung du ma bstan pa'i chos rnams shes bya'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten pa'i chos rnams gang lags/ bcom ldan
174a7(khri brgyad stong pa): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'jig rten pa'i chos shes bya ba ni/ phung po lnga dang / skye mched bcu gnyis dang / khams bco brgyad dang / dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams
174b1(khri brgyad stong pa): dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos ma gtogs par
174b2(khri brgyad stong pa): 'jig rten pa'i chos gang ji snyed pa de dag ni 'jig rten pa'i rnams par shes bya'o/ / rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos rnams
174b3(khri brgyad stong pa): gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos rnams shes bya ba ni/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang /
174b4(khri brgyad stong pa): 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid
174b5(khri brgyad stong pa): dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo mtshan ma med pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo smon pa med pa dang / mi shes pa kun shes par byed pa'i dbang po dang / kun shes pa'i dbang po dang /
174b6(khri brgyad stong pa): kun shes pa dang ldan pa'i dbang po dang / rtog pa dang bcas dpyod pa dang bcas pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rtog pa med cing dpyod pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / mi rtog mi spyod pa'i
174b7(khri brgyad stong pa): ting nge 'dzin dang / rig pa dang / rnam par grol ba dang / dran pa dang / shes bzhin dang / tshul bzhin yid la byed pa dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad de/ brgyad gang zhe na/ gzugs
175a1(khri brgyad stong pa): can gzugs rnams la blta ba 'di ni rnam par thar pa dang po'o/ / nang gzugs med par 'du shes pas phyi rol gyi gzugs la blta ba 'di ni rnam par thar pa gnyis
175a2(khri brgyad stong pa): pa'o/ / sdug pa nyid du mos pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa gsum pa'o// de rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes rnams las yang dag par 'das te/ thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams
175a3(khri brgyad stong pa): nub par 'gyur cing / sna tshogs kyi 'du shes rnams yid la mi byed pas nam mkha' mtha' yas so snyam nas/ nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar
175a4(khri brgyad stong pa): pa bzhi pa'o/ / de rnam pa thams cad du nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ rnam par shes pa mtha' yas so snyam nas/ rnam par shes pa mtha' yas skye
175a5(khri brgyad stong pa): mched bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa lnga pa'o/ / de rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ ci'ang med do snyam nas/ ci'ang
175a6(khri brgyad stong pa): med pa'i skye mched bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa drug pa'o/ / de rnam pa thams cad du ci'ang med pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 'das nas/ 'du shes med 'du
175a7(khri brgyad stong pa): med min skye mched bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa bdun pa'o/ / de rnam pa thams cad du 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched las yang dag par 'das nas/ 'du shes dang tshor ba
175b1(khri brgyad stong pa): 'gog pa bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa brgyad pa ste/ de dag ni rnam par thar pa brgyad do// mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu ste/ dgu gang zhe na/
175b2(khri brgyad stong pa): 'dod pa dag las dben pa/ sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos rnams las dben pa/ rtog pa dang bcas pa/ dpyod pa dang bcas pa/ dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can
175b3(khri brgyad stong pa): bsam gtan dang po bsgrubs te gnas pa dang / de rtog pa dang dpyod pa dang bral zhing nang yongs su dang ste/ sems kyi rgyud gcig tu gyur pas rtog pa med pa/ dpyod pa med
175b4(khri brgyad stong pa): pa'i ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan gnyis pa bsgrubs te gnas pa dang / de dga' ba'i 'dod chags dang bral bas btang snyoms la gnas shing / dran
175b5(khri brgyad stong pa): pa dang shes bzhin can yin te bde ba lus kyis myong la/ 'phags pa rnams kyis gang de dran pa dang ldan pabade ba la gnas pa btang snyoms pa'o zhes brjod pa ste/
175b6(khri brgyad stong pa): dga' ba med pa'i bsam gtan gsum pa bsgrubs te gnas pa dang / de bde ba'ang spangs/ snga nas sdug bsngal yang spangs shing / yid bde ba dang yid mi bde ba'ang nub
175b7(khri brgyad stong pa): pas/ bde ba'ang ma yin/ sdug bsngal ba'ang ma yin pa/ btang snyoms dang dran pa yong su dge pa bsam gtan bzhi pa bsgrubs te gnas pa dang / de rnam pa thams
176a1(khri brgyad stong pa): cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes rnams las yang dag par 'das te/ thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par gyur cing / sna tshogs kyi 'du shes rnams yid la mi byed/
176a2(khri brgyad stong pa): pas/ nam mkha' mtha' yas so snyam nas/ nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched bsgrubs te gnas pa dang / de rnam pa thams cad du nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las
176a3(khri brgyad stong pa): yang dag par 'das te/ rnam par shes pa mtha' yas so snyam nas/ rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched pasgrubs te gnas pa dang / de rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha'
176a4(khri brgyad stong pa): yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ ci'ang med do snyam nas/ ci'ang med pa'i skye mched bsgrubs te gnas pa dang / de rnam pa thams cad du ci'ang med pa'i skye mched
176a5(khri brgyad stong pa): las yang dag par 'das nas/ 'du shes med 'du shes med mini skye mched bsgrubs te gnas pa dang / de rnam pa thams cad du 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched las yang/
176a6(khri brgyad stong pa): dag par 'das te/ 'du shes dang tshor ba 'gog pa bsgrubs nas gnas pa ste/ de dag ni mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'o// nang stong pa nyid nas/
176a7(khri brgyad stong pa): dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas
176b1(khri brgyad stong pa): kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad rnams te/ de dag ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos rnams shes bya'o// de la zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos rnams gang zhe na/ 'di lta
176b2(khri brgyad stong pa): phung po lnga dang / skye mched bcu gnyis dang / khams bco brgyad dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi
176b3(khri brgyad stong pa): ste/ de dag ni zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos rnams shes bya'o// de la zag pa med pa'i chos rnams gang zhe na/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong
176b4(khri brgyad stong pa): ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / stobs
176b5(khri brgyad stong pa): bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dag ste/ de dag ni zag pa med pa'i chos
176b6(khri brgyad stong pa): rnams shes bya'o/ / de la 'dus byas kyi chos rnams gang zhe na/ 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs med pa'i khams dang / de ma
176b7(khri brgyad stong pa): yin pa'i gzhan gang dag 'dus byas su gtogs pa'i chos byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dag kyang yin te/
177a1(khri brgyad stong pa): de dag ni 'dus byas kyi chos rnams shes bya'o// de la 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams gang zhe na/ chos gang dag la skye ba dang / 'jig pa dang /
177a2(khri brgyad stong pa): gzhan du 'gyur ba mi snang ba dag ste/ 'dod chags zad pa dang / zhe sdang zad pa dang / gti mug zad pa dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin
177a3(khri brgyad stong pa): pab de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings nyid dang / chos gnas pa nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' ste/ de dag ni 'dus ma byas kyi chos
177a4(khri brgyad stong pa): rnams shes bya'o/ / de la thun mong gi chos rnams gang zhe na/ bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /
177a5(khri brgyad stong pa): mngon par shes pa lnga ste/ de dag ni thun mong gi chos rnams shes bya'o// de la thun mong ma yin pa'i chos rnams gang zhe na/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun
177a6(khri brgyad stong pa): dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi
177a7(khri brgyad stong pa): dag ste/ de dag ni thun mong ma yin pa'i chos rnams shes bya'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/ chos thams cad la sto/
177b1(khri brgyad stong pa): pa med pa dang dpyod pa med pa'i phyir/ rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa'i chos rnams la chags pa med pa dang yod pa ma yin par bslab par bya'o// chos thams cad gnyis su med
177b2(khri brgyad stong pa): pa'i tshul du khong du chud par bya'o/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'
177b3(khri brgyad stong pa): sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi ba ci'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor sems can gyi phung po chen po dang
177b4(khri brgyad stong pa): sems can gyi ris phal po che'i phul byed par 'gyur bas/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bya'o// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das

177b6(khri brgyad stong pa): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor sems can gyi tshogs chen po zhes bya ba ni/ 'di lta ste/ rigs kyi sa dang / brgyad pa dang / rgyun du zhugs pa dang /

178a1(khri brgyad stong pa): sa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bar dag go/ / rab 'byor de ni sems can gyi tshogs chen po dang / sems can gyi ris pha la
178a2(khri brgyad stong pa): po che zhes bya ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni de ni phul du byed par 'gyur ro// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rdo rje lta bu'i sems bskyed
178a3(khri brgyad stong pa): sems can gyi tshogs chen po dang / sems can gyi ros phal po che'i phul du 'gyur bar bya'o// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje

178a5(khri brgyad stong pa): 'khor ba dpag tu med pa'i sems can thams cad kyi don du bdag gos go cha bgo bar bya'o// bdag gis bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtang bar bya'o// bdag gis sems
178a6(khri brgyad stong pa): can thams cad la sems mnyam pa nyid bskyed par bya'o/ / bdag gis sems can thams cad theg pa gsum gyis yongs su mya ngan las bzla bar bya'o// sems can
178a7(khri brgyad stong pa): thams cad yongs su mya ngan las bzlas kyang / sems can gang yang yongs su mya ngan las bzlas pa med pas/ chos thams cad skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa
178b1(khri brgyad stong pa): bdag gis rtogs par bya'o/ / bdag gis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems ma 'dres pas pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyad par bya'o// bdag gis sems can thams
178b2(khri brgyad stong pa): cad kyi rjes su song ba'i chos rtogs pa yongs su grub pa la bslab par bya'o/ / chos rnams tshul gcig tu bsgrubs pa bdag gis rtogs par bya'o// bdag gis chos dpag tu med/
178b3(khri brgyad stong pa): pa'i bar dag bsgrub pa rtogs par bya ba'i phyir bslab par bya'o snyam du sems bskyed do// rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems bskyed
178b4(khri brgyad stong pa): pa rdo rje lta bu dang / de la gnas nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can gyi tshogs chen po dang / sems can gyi ris phal po che'i phul byed par 'gyur te/ de'ang mi
178b5(khri brgyad stong pa): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byed do/ / rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems 'di ltar skyed de/ sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gros
178b6(khri brgyad stong pa): skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skyes pa'i sems can ji snyed cig sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba myong bar 'gyur ba de dag gi don du bdag gis sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba de nyams su myong bar
178b7(khri brgyad stong pa): bya'o snyam du sems skyed do/ / de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gong du sems 'di ltar bskyed par bya ste/ bdag gis sems can de dag phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i/
179a1(khri brgyad stong pa): mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las bzlas par ma gyur gyi bar du sems can gcig gi don du'ang bskul pa bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum phrag mang /
179a2(khri brgyad stong pa): por sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal de bdag gis nyams su myong bar bya'o// zhes thabs de lta bus sems can de dag phung po lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su
179a3(khri brgyad stong pa): yongs su mya ngan las bzlas par ma gyur kyi bar du sems can thams cad kyi ched du bdag gis sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal de nyams su myong bar bya'o/ / phyis gdod
179a4(khri brgyad stong pa): bdag gi don du dge ba'i rtsa ba dag bskyed de/ bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum du byang chub kyi tshogs bsags la bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par
179a5(khri brgyad stong pa): rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya'o snyam du sems bskyed par bya'o/ / rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems bskyed pa rdo rje lta bu ste/ de la gnas
179a6(khri brgyad stong pa): nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems can gyi tshogs chen po dang / sems can gyi ris phal po che'i phul byed par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor
179a7(khri brgyad stong pa): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems gang gis sems can thams cad kyi phul du 'gyur ba'i sems rlabs po che rtag par rgyan du bsred par bya'o/ /
179b1(khri brgyad stong pa): / de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems rlabs po che ni gang sems dang po bskyed pa nas gzung ste/ 'dod chags kyi sems mi skyed/ zhe sdang gi sems
179b2(khri brgyad stong pa): mi skyed/ gti mug gi sems mi skyed/ rnam par 'tshe ba'i sems mi skyed/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sems mi skyed pa ste/ rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa'
179b3(khri brgyad stong pa): sems dpa' chen po'i sems rlabs po che yin te/ des sems can thams cad kyi phul du phyin par byed cing / des rlom sems su'ang mi byed do// rab 'byor gzhan
179b4(khri brgyad stong pa): yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos mi sgul ba'i sems su bya'o/ / de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems mi skul ba ni 'di yin te/ gang
179b5(khri brgyad stong pa): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pas rlom sems su mi byed pa ste/ rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems mi sgul ba'o//
179b6(khri brgyad stong pa): rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde bar bya ba'i phyir sems bskyed par bya'o// de la byang chub sems
179b7(khri brgyad stong pa): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i phan pa dang bde bar bya ba'i sems ni 'di yin te/ gang sems can thams cad skyob cing / sems can thams cad yongs su mi gtong la/ nges
180a1(khri brgyad stong pa): rlom sems su'ang mi byed pa ste/ rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i phan pa dang bde bar bya ba'i sems so// rab 'byor byung
180a2(khri brgyad stong pa): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni/ sems can thams cad kyi phul du phyin par byed par 'gyur te/ de'ang mi dmigs pa'i
180a3(khri brgyad stong pa): tshul gyis byed do/ / rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rtag par rgyun du chos 'dod par bya'o// chos la dga' bar bya'o//
180a4(khri brgyad stong pa): chos la kun tu dga' bar bya'o// chos la kun tu dga' ba'i rnal 'byor la brtson par bya'o// de la chos gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ chos thams cad dbyer med pa ste/ de ni
180a5(khri brgyad stong pa): chos shes bya'o/ / de la chos 'dod pa gang zhe na/ gang chos 'dod cing mos pa ste/ de ni chos 'dod pa zhes bya'o// de la chos la dga' ba gang zhes na/ gang chos la dga'
180a6(khri brgyad stong pa): zhing mngon par dga' ba ste/ de ni chos la dga' ba zhes bya'o// de la chos la kun tu dga' ba gang zhe na/ gang chos la yon tan dang phan yon du lta ba ste/ de ni chos la kun tu
180a7(khri brgyad stong pa): dga' ba zhes bya'o/ / de la chos la kun tu dga' ba'i rnal 'byor la brtson pa gang zhe na/ chos de nyid la sgom zhing mang du byed pa ste/ de ni chos la kun tu dga' ba'i rnal 'byor
180b1(khri brgyad stong pa): la brtson pa zhes bya'o/ / rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pas/ sems can gyi tshogs chen po dang / sems
180b2(khri brgyad stong pa): can gyi ris phal po che'i phul du phyin par bya ste/ de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
180b3(khri brgyad stong pa): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/ nang stong pa nyid la gnas/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la gnas nas/ sems can gyi tshogs chen po dang /
180b4(khri brgyad stong pa): sems can gyi ris phal po che'i phul du phyin par bya ste/ de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
180b5(khri brgyad stong pa): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun la gnas/ stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig
180b6(khri brgyad stong pa): pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dag la gnas nas/ sems can gyi tshogs chen po dang / sems can gyi ris phal po che'i phul du phyin par bya/
180b7(khri brgyad stong pa): ste/ de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spong bas/
181a1(khri brgyad stong pa): rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ nam mkha' ltar chags pa med pas rnam par grol zhing gos pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi bar la gnas te/ sems can gyi
181a2(khri brgyad stong pa): tshogs chen po dang / sems can gyi ris phal po che'i phul du phyin par bya ste/ de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab
181a3(khri brgyad stong pa): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa chos de dag la gnas te/ sems can gyi tshogs chen po dang / sems can gyi ris phal po che'i phul du phyin par byed par 'gyur te/ de'i phyir
181a4(khri brgyad stong pa): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bya'o/ / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgya stong pa las/ khrel yod pa'i le'u zhes bya ste bcu gcig pa'o// /
181a5(khri brgyad stong pa): / de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das don gang gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi
181a6(khri brgyad stong pa): ba la bdag spo bas lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu don gang gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bya ba la khyod spobs par gyis
181a7(khri brgyad stong pa): shig/ shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag tu lta ba spang ba'i slad du sems can rnams la chos ston pa dang / de bzhin du sems can du lta ba dang / srog tu lta ba dang /
181b1(khri brgyad stong pa): gang zag tu lta ba dang / gso ba dang / skyes bu dang / shed las skyes dang / shed bu dang / byed pa po dang / byed du 'jug pa po dang / slong ba po dang / kun nas slong ba po dang /
181b2(khri brgyad stong pa): tshor ba po dang / tshor bar byed du 'jug pa po dang / shes pa po dang / mthong ba por lta ba dang / chad par lta ba dang / rtag par lta ba dang / yod par lta ba dang / med par lta ba
181b3(khri brgyad stong pa): dang / phung por lta ba dang / khams su lta ba dang / skye mched du lta ba dang / dben par lta ba dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung bar lta ba dang / pha rol tu phyin par lta ba dang / byang
181b4(khri brgyad stong pa): chub kyi phyogs kyi chos su lta ba dang / stobs dang mi 'jigs par lta ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres par lta ba dang / sems can yongs su smin par bya bar lta ba dang / sangs
181b5(khri brgyad stong pa): rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya bar lta ba dang / byang chub tu lta ba dang / sangs rgyas su lta ba dang / chos su lta ba dang / dge 'dun du lta ba dang / chos kyi 'khor lo skor bar lta ba dang /
181b6(khri brgyad stong pa): yongs su mya ngan las 'das par lta ba spang ba'i slad du mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis sems can rnams la chos ston te/ don des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi'o//
181b7(khri brgyad stong pa): de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu ci'i phyir na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
182a1(khri brgyad stong pa): dpa' chen po gzugs su lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ sangs rgyas/
182a2(khri brgyad stong pa): kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i bar du lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
182a3(khri brgyad stong pa): spyod pa thabs la mi mkhas pas gzugs la dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ / de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la
182a4(khri brgyad stong pa): dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i bar du dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de'i phyir byang chub
182a5(khri brgyad stong pa): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzugs su lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i bar du lta bar 'gyur ba yin te/ de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
182a6(khri brgyad stong pa): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa thabs la mkhas pas lta ba de dag spang ba'i phyir mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston to/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa rab
182a7(khri brgyad stong pa): 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das don gang gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi ba la bdag kyang spobs lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis
182b1(khri brgyad stong pa): bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor khyod spobs par gyis shig/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi sems/ zag pa med pa'i sems/ mnyam pa med pa'i sems/ mi
182b2(khri brgyad stong pa): mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i sems/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mong ma lags pa'i sems gang lags pa'i sems de la'ang chags pa ma mchis pas don des na/ byang chub sems
182b3(khri brgyad stong pa): dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi'o/ / de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems de ni zag pa ma mchis shing khongs su gtogs pa ma lags pa lags te/ thams cad mkhyen/
182b4(khri brgyad stong pa): pa nyid kyi sems zag pa ma mchis shing / khongs su gtogs pa ma lags pa'i sems de la'ang chags pa ma mchis pas/ de'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi ba'i grang
182b5(khri brgyad stong pa): su mchi'o/ / de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems mi
182b6(khri brgyad stong pa): mnyam pa dang mnyam pa nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mong ma yin pa'i sems de gang yin/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
182b7(khri brgyad stong pa): chen po sems dang po bskyed phyin chad chos gang la'ang skye ba 'am 'gag par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / 'grib pa dang / 'phel ba dang / 'ong ba dang / 'gro ba dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam
183a1(khri brgyad stong pa): par byang bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gang la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / 'grib pa med pa dang / 'phel ba med pa dang / 'ong ba med pa/
183a2(khri brgyad stong pa): dang / 'gro ba med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa de la nyan thos kyi sems med/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sems med/ byang chub sems dpa'i sems med/ yang dag par rdzogs
183a3(khri brgyad stong pa): pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sems med do/ / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mong ma yin/
183a4(khri brgyad stong pa): pa'i sems so// shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor khyod kyis 'di skad du thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems zag pa med pa khongs su gtogs pa ma yin pa gang yin pa'i sems de la'ang chags pa
183a5(khri brgyad stong pa): med ces smras na/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gzugs kyang chags pa med pa yin nam/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'ang chags pa med pa yin nam/ rab 'byor gyis
183a6(khri brgyad stong pa): smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de de bzhin te/ gzugs kyang chags pa med do// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'ang chags pa med do// byang chub kyi phyogs/
183a7(khri brgyad stong pa): kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang / stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi bar du'ang chags pa med do// shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan
183b1(khri brgyad stong pa): pa rab 'byor khyod kyis 'di skad du thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems gang yin pa de'ang zag pa med cing khongs su gtogs pa ma yin no zhes smras na/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams
183b2(khri brgyad stong pa): kyi sems kyang rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa med cing khongs su gtogs pa ma yin pa yin nam/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sems dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thugs kyang
183b3(khri brgyad stong pa): rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa med cing khongs su gtogs pa ma yin pa yin nam/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de de bzhin no// shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor
183b4(khri brgyad stong pa): de gzugs kyang rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa med cing khongs su gtogs pa ma yin pa yin nam/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'ang rang bzhin gyis stong
183b5(khri brgyad stong pa): pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa med cing khongs su gtogs pa ma yin pa yin nam/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de de bzhin no// shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor byang chub kyi phyogs kyi
183b6(khri brgyad stong pa): chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dag kyang rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir
183b7(khri brgyad stong pa): zag pa med cing khongs su gtogs pa ma yin pa yin nam/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu ji skad smras pa de de bzhin te/ byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams kyi sems kyang rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid
184a1(khri brgyad stong pa): kyi phyir dag pa med cing khongs su gtogs pa ma yin no/ / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sems dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thugs kyang rang bzhin gyis spyong
184a2(khri brgyad stong pa): pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa med cing khongs su gtogs pa ma yin no/ / gzugs kyang rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa med cing khongs su gtogs pa ma yin no// rnam par shes pa'i bar du'ang rang bzhi/
184a3(khri brgyad stong pa): gyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa med cing khongs su gtog pa ma yin no// byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs
184a4(khri brgyad stong pa): rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dag kyang rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa med cing khongs su gtogs pa ma yin no/ / shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor khyod kyis gang
184a5(khri brgyad stong pa): 'di skad du sems med pa'i phyir sems de la'ang chags pa med ces smras na/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gzugs med pa'ang gzugs la chags pa med dam/ tshor ba med pa'ang tshor ba la chags pa med
184a6(khri brgyad stong pa): dam/ 'du shes med pa'ang 'du shes la chags pa med dam/ 'du byed rnams med pa'ang 'du byed rnams la chags pa med dam/ rnam par shes pa med pa'ang rnam par shes pa la chags pa med dam/ rab
184a7(khri brgyad stong pa): 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de de bzhin no// shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams med pa'ang byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams la
184b1(khri brgyad stong pa): chags pa med dam/ sangs rgya kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i bar dag med pa'ang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la chags pa med dam/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de
184b2(khri brgyad stong pa): de bzhin no/ / ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/ gzugs med pa'ang gzugs la chags pa med do// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa med pa'ang rnam par shes
184b3(khri brgyad stong pa): pa la chags pa med do/ / khams rnams dang / skye mched rnams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba rnams dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang / stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so
184b4(khri brgyad stong pa): yang dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i bar dag med pa'ang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la chags pa med do// shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab
184b5(khri brgyad stong pa): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni/ byang chub kyi sems mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i sems/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mong ma yin pa'i sems des kyang chos thams cad mi
184b6(khri brgyad stong pa): dmig pa'i tshul gyis rlom sems su 'gyur ba med/ mngon par zhen par 'gyur ba med de/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bya'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa las/
184b7(khri brgyad stong pa): lta ba spang ba'i le'u zhes bya ste bcu gnyis pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa byams ma'i bu gang pos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das don gang gis
185a1(khri brgyad stong pa): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi ba la bdag kyang spobs lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang po khyod spobs par gyis shig/ gang
185a2(khri brgyad stong pa): bopos gsol pa/ bcom lda 'das sems can de ni go cha chen po bgos pa lags/ sems can de ni theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa lags/ sems can de ni theg pa chen po la yang dag par gnas
185a3(khri brgyad stong pa): pa lags te/ bcom ldan 'das de'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus/ tshe dang ldan pa byams ma'i bu gang po la
185a4(khri brgyad stong pa): 'di skad ces smras so/ / tshe dang ldan pa gang po ji tsam gyis na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa zhes bya/ gang pos smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di la byang chub
185a5(khri brgyad stong pa): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni nyi tshe'i sems can rnams kyi ched du byang chub kyi phyir spyod pa ma yin/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te sbyin pa sbyin pa ma yin gyi/ sems can thams
185a6(khri brgyad stong pa): cad kyi don du sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing sbyin pa sbyin par byed do/ / nyi tshe'i sems can rnams kyi ched du tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te tshul khrims srung ba ma yin gyi/ sems can
185a7(khri brgyad stong pa): thams cad kyi ched du tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing tshul khrims srung ngo / / nyi tshe'i sems can rnams kyi ched du bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te bzod bsgom pa ma yin gyi/ sems
185b1(khri brgyad stong pa): can thams cad kyi ched du bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing bzod pa sgom par byed do/ / nyi tshe'i sems can rnams kyi cheng du brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te brtson 'grus rtsom pa ma yin gyi
185b2(khri brgyad stong pa): sems can thams cad kyi ched du brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing brtson 'grus rtsom mo/ / nyi tshe'i sems can rnams kyi ched du bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te bsam gtan sgom pa ma
185b3(khri brgyad stong pa): yin gyi/ sems can thams cad kyi ched du bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing bsam gtan rnams skyed do// nyi tshe'i sems can rnams kyi ched du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te shes
185b4(khri brgyad stong pa): rab sgom pa ma yin gyi/ sems can thams cad kyi ched du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing shes rab sgom par byed do// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sems can 'di snyed cig ni
185b5(khri brgyad stong pa): phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las bzla bar bya'o/ / sems can 'di snyed cig ni yongs su mya ngan las bzla bar mi bya'o zhe 'am/ sems can 'di
185b6(khri brgyad stong pa): snyed cig ni byang chub la dgod par bya'o/ / sems can 'di snyed cig ni byang chub la dgod par mi bya'o zhes/ sems can yongs su dpag pa go cha mi gyon gyi/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
185b7(khri brgyad stong pa): chen po ni sems can thams cad kyi ched du go chagyon no/ / de 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gis kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang
186a1(khri brgyad stong pa): sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyar bar bya'o/ / de bzhin du bdag gis kyang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha
186a2(khri brgyad stong pa): rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyar bar bya'o//
186a3(khri brgyad stong pa): snyam mo// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag
186a4(khri brgyad stong pa): gis ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis sbyin pa sbyin zhing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de'ang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas nas/ bla na med pa yang
186a5(khri brgyad stong pa): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo ba de ni/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'i chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha'o// tshe dang
186a6(khri brgyad stong pa): ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis sbyin pa sbyin zhing / nyan thos
186a7(khri brgyad stong pa): dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su mi sngo ba de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa sbyin pa sbyin pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha'o// cho dang
186b1(khri brgyad stong pa): l dan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa sbyin pa rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis chos de dag la bzod pa dang mos pa gang
186b2(khri brgyad stong pa): yin pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa sbyin pa sbyin pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang
186b3(khri brgyad stong pa): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa sbyin pa rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis/ / brtson 'grus ma gtang ba gang yin pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa'
186b4(khri brgyad stong pa): sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i sbyin pa sbyin pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha'o/ / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
186b5(khri brgyad stong pa): sbyin pa sbyin pa 'di lta ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis sems rtse gcig tu byed de/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i sems rnams kyi skabs mi 'byed pa
186b6(khri brgyad stong pa): gang yin pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa sbyin pa sbyin pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang
186b7(khri brgyad stong pa): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa sbyin zhing / de gcig pu la dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad la sgyu mas byas pa'i 'du shes nye bar gnas shing sbyin pa po'ang mi dmigs/ sbyin
187a1(khri brgyad stong pa): pa'ang mi dmigs/ len pa po'ang mi dmigs pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa sbyin pa sbyin pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
187a2(khri brgyad stong pa): pa'i go cha'o/ / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gi tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis/ pha rol tu phyin pa de dag la
187a3(khri brgyad stong pa): mtshan mar mi 'dzin cing mi dmigs pa ni/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa go cha chen po bgos par rig par bya ba yin no//
187a4(khri brgyad stong pa): tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag
187a5(khri brgyad stong pa): gis sbyin pa sbyin zhing / de'ang sems can thams cad dang thun song du byas nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo ba de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
187a6(khri brgyad stong pa): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa nyan thos
187a7(khri brgyad stong pa): d ang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la'ang 'dod pa med na so so'i skye bo sa la sa smos kyang ci dgos pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshul
187b1(khri brgyad stong pa): khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i
187b2(khri brgyad stong pa): yid la bya ba dag gis chos de dag la bzod pa dang mos pa gang yin pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu
187b3(khri brgyad stong pa): phyin pa'o/ / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya
187b4(khri brgyad stong pa): ba dag gis brtson 'grus ma nyams mi 'gong ba gang yin pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin
187b5(khri brgyad stong pa): pa'o/ / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba
187b6(khri brgyad stong pa): dag gis gnas pa nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyang ldan pa'i sems rnams kyi skabs mi 'byed cing / sems bskyed pa de'ang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas nas
187b7(khri brgyad stong pa): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo ba de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i bsam
188a1(khri brgyad stong pa): gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa rnam pa thams
188a2(khri brgyad stong pa): cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yod la bya ba dag gis/ chos thams cad la sgyu mas byas pa'i 'du shes nye bar gnas te/ rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir tshul khrims des rlom sems su'ang mo byed la mi dmigs
188a3(khri brgyad stong pa): pa de ni/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa'
188a4(khri brgyad stong pa): sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni pha rol tu phyin pa drug po thams cad yongs su 'dzin te/ de'i phyir go cha chen po bgos pa zhes bya'o//
188a5(khri brgyad stong pa): tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis ma yin gyi/ rnam
188a6(khri brgyad stong pa): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis sbyin pa sbyin zhing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de'ang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
188a7(khri brgyad stong pa): nuchub tu yongs su sngo ba de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i smyon pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i
188b1(khri brgyad stong pa): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang de bzhin no// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'
188b2(khri brgyad stong pa): sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis ma yin gyi/ shes rab kyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang
188b3(khri brgyad stong pa): ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yang dag par sgrub pa dang / sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir sbyor te/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de'ang sems
188b4(khri brgyad stong pa): can thams cad dang thun mong du byas nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo ba de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu
188b5(khri brgyad stong pa): phyin pa la spyod pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
188b6(khri brgyad stong pa): gnas te/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gos ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gos sbyin pa sbyin zhing / dge ba'i rtsa ba
188b7(khri brgyad stong pa): de'ang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo ba de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin
189a1(khri brgyad stong pa): pa'o sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha ro
189a2(khri brgyad stong pa): tu phyin pa'ang de bzhin no/ / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i/
189a3(khri brgyad stong pa): yid la bya ba dag gi ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom zhing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de'ang sems can thams cad dang thun
189a4(khri brgyad stong pa): mong du byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo ba de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i shes rab kyi pha
189a5(khri brgyad stong pa): rol tu phyin pa'o/ / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ nyan thos dang rang sangs
189a6(khri brgyad stong pa): rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis sbyin pa sbyin zhing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de'ang sems can thams cad dang
189a7(khri brgyad stong pa): thun mong du byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo ba de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'o bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i skyon pa'i pha
189b1(khri brgyad stong pa): rol tu phyin pa'o/ / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang de bzhin no// tshe dang
189b2(khri brgyad stong pa): ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom zhing / chos thams cad la sgyu
189b3(khri brgyad stong pa): mas byas pa'i 'du shes nye bar 'jog ste/ de'ang nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yod la bya ba dag gis ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yod pa bya ba dag gis
189b4(khri brgyad stong pa): byed cing / dge ba'i rtse ba de'ang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo ba de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
189b5(khri brgyad stong pa): chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
189b6(khri brgyad stong pa): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas to/ / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gos
189b7(khri brgyad stong pa): 'khor gsum yongs su dag par sbyin pa sbyin zhing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de'ang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo ba de ni//
190a1(khri brgyad stong pa): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshul
190a2(khri brgyad stong pa): khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang de bzhin no// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang
190a3(khri brgyad stong pa): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom zhing / de pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad dang / chos thams cad la sgyu ma
190a4(khri brgyad stong pa): dang / rmi lam dang / mig yor dang / brag cha dang / gzugs brnyan dang / sprul pa lta bu'i 'du shes nye bar gnas pa yin te/ de nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag
190a5(khri brgyad stong pa): gis ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis gnas shing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de'ang sems can thams cad dang thun mong byas te/ bla na med pa yang
190a6(khri brgyad stong pa): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo ba de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o//
190a7(khri brgyad stong pa): tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa re re la gnas te/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug po thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed do//
190b1(khri brgyad stong pa): tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni bsam gtan rnams la snyoms par 'jug la/ bsam gtan rnams kyi ro myang bar mi byed ci
190b2(khri brgyad stong pa): de dag gis kyang mi 'phrogs te/ de dag gi dbang gis kyang mi skye/ tshad med pa dang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dag la'ang snyoms par 'jug la/ ro myang bar yang mi byed cing / de dag gis
190b3(khri brgyad stong pa): kyang mi 'phrogs la/ de dag gi dbang gis kyang mi skye ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i thabs pa mkhas pa dang ldan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu
190b4(khri brgyad stong pa): phyin par rig par bya'o/ / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms
190b5(khri brgyad stong pa): par 'jug pa dag la dbyen par mthong nas gnas/ stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med par mthong nas gnas kyang yang dag pa'i mtha' yang mngon gsum du mi byed de/
190b6(khri brgyad stong pa): de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs la mkhas pa'i go cha chen po yin te/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa'
190b7(khri brgyad stong pa): sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa zhes bya'o/ / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar go cha chen po bgos pa la phyogs bcu dag na
191a1(khri brgyad stong pa): bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyang 'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhes bya ba zhig na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po
191a2(khri brgyad stong pa): bgos pa zhog sems can rnams kyang yongs su smin par byed/ sangs rgyas kyi zhong yang yongs su dag par byed ces ched du brjod pa ched du rjod cing / bsngags pa'ang gsung la/ mang yang
191a3(khri brgyad stong pa): yongs su sgrogs shing / byang chub sems dpa' de'i sgra rjod pa'ang mdzad la/ dbyangs rjes su sgrogs pa'ang mdzad do// shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa
191a4(khri brgyad stong pa): gang po ji tsam gyis na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa yin/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni gang yin
191a5(khri brgyad stong pa): gang pos smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod cing / de sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na 'dod pa dag las dben pa
191a6(khri brgyad stong pa): sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos rnams las dben pa/ rtogs pa dang bcas pa/ dpyod pa dang bcas pa/ dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde can bsam gtan dang po rdzogs par byas te gnas
191a7(khri brgyad stong pa): ba dang / de bzhin du bsam gtan gnyis pa dang / gsum pa dang / bzhi pa yongs su rdzogs par byas te gnas pa dang / de byams pa dang ldan pa'i sems yangs pa/ rgya chen por
191b1(khri brgyad stong pa): gyur pa/ tshad med pa/ mi gnyis pa/ khon med pa 'gran zla med pa/ gnod pa med pa/ shin tu bsgoms pas 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas
191b2(khri brgyad stong pa): pa/ na mkha'i khams kyi mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu khyab par byas te gnas pa dang / de bzhin du snying rje dang ldan pa dang / dga' ba dang ldan pa dang / btang
191b3(khri brgyad stong pa): snyoms dang ldan pa'i sems yangs pa/ rgya chen por gyur pa/ tshad med pa/ mi gnyis pa/ khon med pa/ 'gran zla med pa/ gnod pa med pa/ shin tu
191b4(khri brgyad stong pa): bsgoms pas 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i khams kyi mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu khyab par byas te gnas pa dang / de bzhin du nam mkha' mtha' yas
191b5(khri brgyad stong pa): skye mched dang / rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang / ci'ang med pa'i skye mched dang / 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched rdzogs par byas te gnas pa de ni/ byang chub
191b6(khri brgyad stong pa): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
191b7(khri brgyad stong pa): chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa gang gi tshe nam mkha'i rnam pa dang / rtags dang / mtshan ma rnams kyis bsam gtan de dag dang / tshad med pa de dag dang
192a1(khri brgyad stong pa): gzugs med pa de dag la snyoms par 'jug cing ldang ba na dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
192a2(khri brgyad stong pa): pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo bar byed do/ / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin
192a3(khri brgyad stong pa): pa la spyod pa la'ang gong ma bzhin du sbyar bar bya'o/ / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
192a4(khri brgyad stong pa): pa bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi po dag la snyoms par 'jug pa ste/ gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
192a5(khri brgyad stong pa): bsam gtan de dag dang / tshad med pa de dag dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gis gnas shing / de bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs
192a6(khri brgyad stong pa): med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag la snyoms par 'jug la/ ldang ba na nam mkha'i rnam pa dang / rtag dang / mtshan ma rnams yid la byed de/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
192a7(khri brgyad stong pa): spyod pa de dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag dang / gzhan dag kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis/ sems can thams cad dang thun mongs du byas nas/ bla na
192b1(khri brgyad stong pa): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo bar byed do/ / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po yin te/ de ltar na byang chub
192b2(khri brgyad stong pa): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa yin no/ / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa
192b3(khri brgyad stong pa): dang ldan pa'i sems yangs pa/ rgya chen por gyur pa/ tshad med pa/ mi gnyis pa/ khon med pa/ 'gran zla med pa/ gnod pa med pa/ shin tu bsgoms pas 'jig rten chos kyi
192b4(khri brgyad stong pa): dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i khams kyi mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs gcig khyab par byas te gnas shing / phyogs bcu'i bar du khyab par byas te gnas pa dang / snying rje dang ldan pa dang /
192b5(khri brgyad stong pa): dga' ba dang ldan pa'ang de bzhin te/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po btang snyoms dang ldan pa'i sems yangs pa/ rgya chen por gyur pa/ tshad
192b6(khri brgyad stong pa): med pa/ mi gnyis pa/ khon med pa/ 'gran zla med pa/ gnod pa med pa/ shin tu bsgoms pas 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i khams kyi
192b7(khri brgyad stong pa): mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu'i phyogs re rer khyab par byas nas gnas pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i tong nge 'dzin ces bya'o// gzhan yang
193a1(khri brgyad stong pa): b yang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems snying rje chen po sngon du 'gro bas sems can thams cad kyi nyon
193a2(khri brgyad stong pa): mongs pa bsal ba'i phyir pa sa ma gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams gzhan dag la rjod cing ston te/ rab tu 'tshal la rnam par 'byed de gsal bar
193a3(khri brgyad stong pa): byed cing / de dag gi ro myang ba dang / nyes dmigs dang / nges par 'byung ba'ang tshul bzhin du ston pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// /
193a4(khri brgyad stong pa): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba de dag nyid kyis/ bsam gtan dang po dang / bsam gtan bzhi pa'i bar dag gnon cing sgom ste/ bsam gtan dang po dang /
193a5(khri brgyad stong pa): bsam gtan bzhi pa'i bar de la'ang gnas la/ 'di lta ste/ nyan thos kyi sems sam// rang sangs rgyas kyi sems dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa gzhan dag gi skabs mi 'byed pa de ni/
193a6(khri brgyad stong pa): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nag nog med pa'o// byang chub sems dpar sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i
193a7(khri brgyad stong pa): yid la bya ba dag gis gnas pa de 'di snyam du sems te/ sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa zad par bya ba'i phyir chos bstan to snyam nas yin la byed pa de dag la 'dod pa dang / bzod
193b1(khri brgyad stong pa): pab dang / yongs su rtog pa dang / khong du chud par byed pa dang / nye bar nges sems pa gang yin pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o//
193b2(khri brgyad stong pa): tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad sems can
193b3(khri brgyad stong pa): thams cad dang thun mongs du byas nas/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su sngo zhing / brtson 'grus kyang mi gtong ba de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i brtson 'grus
193b4(khri brgyad stong pa): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gi tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis/ bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang /
193b5(khri brgyad stong pa): ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad la snyoms par 'jug cing ldang yang nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yang mi ltung zhing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de'ang sems can thams
193b6(khri brgyad stong pa): cad dang thun mong du byas nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo ba de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// byang chub
193b7(khri brgyad stong pa): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gis tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis/ bsam gtan dang po'i yan lag rnams dang / bsam gtan gnyis pa dang / gsum pa
194a1(khri brgyad stong pa): dang / bzhi pa'i yan lag rnams la mi rtag pa'i rnam pa dang / sdug bsngal ba'i rnam pa dang / bdag med pa'i rnam pa dang / bzhi pa'i rnam pa dang / stong pa'i rnam pa
194a2(khri brgyad stong pa): dang / mtshan ma med pa'i rnam pa dang / smon pa med pa'i rnam par so sor rtog pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang
194a3(khri brgyad stong pa): ldan pa shA ri'i bu de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi theg pa chen po yin te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang
194a4(khri brgyad stong pa): dag par zhugs pa yin no/ / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni rnam pa thams cad du byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos
194a5(khri brgyad stong pa): sum cu rtsa bdun sgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin sgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du stobs rnams dang /
194a6(khri brgyad stong pa): mi'ajigs pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dag sgom pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po yin te/ de ltar na byang chub
194a7(khri brgyad stong pa): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa yin no/ / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni/
194b1(khri brgyad stong pa): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa'i ting nge 'dzin la'ang snyoms par 'jug cing // bdag gis sems can thams cad bskyab bo zhes mngon par gzhol bar byed pa dang / snying rje'i ting nge
194b2(khri brgyad stong pa): 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug cing / sems can rnams la snying rje ba dang snying brtse bar nges par gzhol ba dang / dga' ba'i ting nge 'dzin la'ang snyoms par 'jug cing / bdag nyid kyis sems can
194b3(khri brgyad stong pa): thams cad dgrol bar bya'o zhes sems can rnams la nges par gzhol ba dang / btang snyoms kyi ting nge 'dzin la'ang snyoms par 'jug cing / sems can rnams kyi zag pa zad par bya ba la nges par
194b4(khri brgyad stong pa): gzhol bar byed pa ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad med pa rnams la spyod pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gi tshe//
194b5(khri brgyad stong pa): bsam gtan dang tshad med pa rnams kyi rnam pa dang / rtags dang // tshan ma dag la snyoms par 'jug cing ldang yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos dang / rang
194b6(khri brgyad stong pa): sangs rgyas kyi sar yang yongs su mi sngo ba de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad med pa rnams la spyod pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nAg nog med pa'o// byang chub sems
194b7(khri brgyad stong pa): dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gi tshe/ bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gis ma 'dres par gnas shing / nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyis
195a1(khri brgyad stong pa): 'am/ sa gnyis po de dag tu 'dod par mi byed kyi/ de rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la bzod cing 'dod pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad med pa/
195a2(khri brgyad stong pa): rnams la spyod pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gi tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa dag gis mi dge ba'i chos
195a3(khri brgyad stong pa): spang ba dang / dge ba'i chos phun sum tshogs par bya ba'i phyir brtson pa mi gtong ba de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad med pa rnams la spyod pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin
195a4(khri brgyad stong pa): pa'o/ / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gi tshe/ bsam gtan de dag dang / tshad med pa de dag dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag la'ang snyoms par
195a5(khri brgyad stong pa): 'jug ste/ bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i dbang gis kyang mi skye la/ de dag gi ro myang bar yang mi byed cing / de dag
195a6(khri brgyad stong pa): gis kyang mi 'phrogs pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad med pa rnams la spyod pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
195a7(khri brgyad stong pa): po gang gi tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med ba'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag la snyoms par
195b1(khri brgyad stong pa): 'jug cing ldang bar yang byed la/ de'ang mi rtag pa'i rnam pa dang / sdug bsngal ba'i rnam pa dang / bdag med pa'i rnam pa dang / zhi ba'i rnam pa dang / stong pa nyid kyi rnam pa dang /
195b2(khri brgyad stong pa): mtshan ma med pa'i rnam pa dang / smon pa med pa'i rnam par so sor rtog kyang nyan thos kyi skyon med pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi skyon med par yang mi 'jug pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
195b3(khri brgyad stong pa): dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po yin te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
195b4(khri brgyad stong pa): chen po theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa yin no/ / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni mi dmigs pa'i tshul
195b5(khri brgyad stong pa): gyis nang stong pa nyid shes pa gang yin pa dang / mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du shes pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems
195b6(khri brgyad stong pa): dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po yin te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa yin no// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan
195b7(khri brgyad stong pa): yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni/ gang chos thams cad la sems rnam par g.yeng ba med cing mnyam par gzhag par shes pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i
196a1(khri brgyad stong pa): bu de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po yin te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs
196a2(khri brgyad stong pa): pa yin no/ / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni rtag ces bya bar shes pa mi 'jug/ mi rtag ces bya ba dang /
196a3(khri brgyad stong pa): bde zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / mazhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mi
196a4(khri brgyad stong pa): stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa yod ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya bar shes pa mi 'jug pa ste
196a5(khri brgyad stong pa): tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po yin te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
196a6(khri brgyad stong pa): po theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa yin no/ / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni 'das pa'i dus la shes pa mi
196a7(khri brgyad stong pa): 'jug/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus la shes pa mi 'jug/ da ltar byung ba'i dus la shes pa'ang mi 'jug la/ de dus gsum po dag mi shes pa'ang ma yin pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri
196b1(khri brgyad stong pa): bu de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po yin te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la
196b2(khri brgyad stong pa): yang dag par zhugs pa yin no/ / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni 'dod pa'i khams su shes pa mi 'jug/
196b3(khri brgyad stong pa): gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs med pa'i khams su shes pa mi 'jug la/ de 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs med pa'i khams mi shes pa'ang ma yin pa ste/
196b4(khri brgyad stong pa): tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po yin te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
196b5(khri brgyad stong pa): theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa yin no/ / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni 'jig rten pa'i chos
196b6(khri brgyad stong pa): rnams la shes pa mi 'jug/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos rnams dang / gzag pa dang bcas pa rnams dang / zag pa med pa rnams dang / 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas kyi chos
196b7(khri brgyad stong pa): rnams la'ang shes pa mi 'jug la/ de 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos rnams mi shes pa'ang ma yin/ zag pa dang bcas pa dang / zag pa med pa dang /
197a1(khri brgyad stong pa): 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams mi shes pa'ang ma yin pa 'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ de ni byang chub sems
197a2(khri brgyad stong pa): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po yin te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa yin no// de nas tshe dang
197a3(khri brgyad stong pa): ldan pa shA ri'i bus/ tshe dang ldan pa byams ma'i bu gang po la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa gang po ji tsam gyis na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang dag par
197a4(khri brgyad stong pa): gnas shes bya/ gang pos smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la yang
197a5(khri brgyad stong pa): dag par gnas la/ des sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'ang mi dmigs/ byang chub sems dpa' yang mi dmigs/ len pa po'ang mi dmigs te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
197a6(khri brgyad stong pa): chen po mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par gnas pa zhes bya'o/ / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha
197a7(khri brgyad stong pa): rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par gnas pa'ang de bzhin no// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
197b1(khri brgyad stong pa): ba la spyod pa ni/ sher rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par gnas la/ de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang mi dmigs/ byang chub sems dpa' yang mi dmigs/ yid la byed la
197b2(khri brgyad stong pa): mi dmigs te/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par gnas pa zhes bya'o//
197b3(khri brgyad stong pa): tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par gzhig pa'i phyir/ nang stong pa
197b4(khri brgyad stong pa): nyid sgom ste/ de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis sgom mo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems ma 'dres pa dag gis bsgom pa rnam par gzhig pa'i phyir/ dngos po med
197b5(khri brgyad stong pa): pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du sgom ste/ de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis sgom mo// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang dag
197b6(khri brgyad stong pa): bar gnas pa zhes bya'o/ / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems ma 'dres pa'i bsgom
197b7(khri brgyad stong pa): pa rnam par gzhig pa'i phyir/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun sgom ste/ de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis sgom mo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems ma 'ja
198a1(khri brgyad stong pa): bdag gis bsgom pa rnam par gzhig pa'i phyir/ stong nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin sgom te/ de'ang mi dmigs pa'i
198a2(khri brgyad stong pa): tshul gyis sgom mo/ / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems pa 'dres pa dag gis bsgom pa rnam par gzhig pa'i phyir/ stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /
198a3(khri brgyad stong pa): so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dag sgom ste/ de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis sgom mo// tshe dang ldan
198a4(khri brgyad stong pa): pa shA ri'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang dag par gnas pa zhes bya'o/ / tshe dang ldan pa ri'i bu rtsa gzhan yang
198a5(khri brgyad stong pa): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de ni tha snyan tsam tu zad par
198a6(khri brgyad stong pa): shes so/ / gzugs dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ 'di lta ste/ gzugs shes bya ba de ni ming tsam du zad do// rnam par shes pa'i bar du
198a7(khri brgyad stong pa): dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ 'di lta ste/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba de ni ming tsam du zad do//
198b1(khri brgyad stong pa): mi dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ 'di lta ste/ mig ces bya ba de ni ming tsam du zad do// yid dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ 'di lta ste/ yid ces bya
198b2(khri brgyad stong pa): ba'i bar de ni ming du zad do/ / khams rnams dang / skye mched rnams dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum n+ta
198b3(khri brgyad stong pa): bdun dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyang de bzhin mo//
198b4(khri brgyad stong pa): nang stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ 'di lta ste/ nang stong pa nyid ces bya ba de ni ming tsam du zad do// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir/

199a1(khri brgyad stong pa): ba de ni ming tsam du zad do zhes bya bar shes te/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang dag par
199a2(khri brgyad stong pa): gnas pa zhes bya'o/ / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mngon par shes pa rnams yongs su rdzogs pa'i phyir/ sems dang
199a3(khri brgyad stong pa): po bskyed pa nas bzung ste/ byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug gi bar du sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed do// sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro'o//

199b7(khri brgyad stong pa): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob nas kyang chos kyi 'khor lo bskor to// zhes snyan pa sgrogs shing dbyangs rjod pa mdzad do//

205b5(khri brgyad stong pa): pa yin te/ des de bzhin du sems can thams cad kyang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug cing 'dzud de 'god par byed do// yang dag par 'dzin du
