300a5(khri brgyad stong pa): dang mthong ba po med pa'i phyir nyan thos kyi theg pa med par rig par bya'o// nyan thos kyi theg pa med pa'i phyir rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa med par rig par bya'o// rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa med pa'i

300b4(khri brgyad stong pa): sems can dpag tu med/ grangs med/ tshad med pa rnams kyi go 'byed de/ rab 'byor rnam grangs des na ji ltar nam mkha' sems can dpag tu med/ grangs med/ tshad med pa
300b5(khri brgyad stong pa): rnams kyi go 'byed pa de bzhin du/ theg pa che ni de'ang sems can dpag tu med/ grangs med/ tshad med pa rnams kyi go 'byed pa yin no// rab 'byor gang yang khyod kyis 'di skad du bcom

302b7(khri brgyad stong pa): rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang
303a1(khri brgyad stong pa): @mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa drug dang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad po dag gi rang bzhin ni gang

304a4(khri brgyad stong pa): gsum mnyam pa nyid kyi theg pa yin te/ theg pa chen po de la ni mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so// de la ni 'dod chags dang 'dod chags dang bral ba'ang mi dmigs so// zhe sdang dang zhe

304b2(khri brgyad stong pa): dang 'dod pa'i khams las yang dag par 'da' ba'ang mi dmigs so/ / gzugs kyi khams dang gzugs kyi khams las yang dag par 'da' ba'ang mi dmigs so// gzugs med pa'i khams dang

305a1(khri brgyad stong pa): panyid kyang stong pa nyid kyis stong pas dmigs su med na/ / stong pa nyid la 'das pa'i gzugs dmigs par sngags bcur/ stong pa nyid la 'das pa'i tshor ba dang / 'du shes

305a6(khri brgyad stong pa): pa 'gyur/ stong banyid pa da ltar byung ba'i gzugs dmigs su med de/ stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid kyis stong pas dmigs su med na/ stong pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i gzugs dmigs par sgrus
305a7(khri brgyad stong pa): la 'gyur/ stong pa nyid la daltar byung ba'i tsha ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dmigs su med de/ stong pa zhid kyang stong pa nyid kyis stong pas dmigs su
305b1(khri brgyad stong pa): med na/ stong pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dmigs par lta ga la 'gyur/ rab 'byor sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni sngon
305b2(khri brgyad stong pa): gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ / rab 'byor sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// rab 'byor sbyin pa'i rol tu phyin pa ni da ltar byung bar mi dmigs so// rab 'byor sbyin pa'i pha
305b3(khri brgyad stong pa): rol tu phyin pa ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs te/ rab 'byor mnyam pa nyid la ni 'das pa'i dus mi dmigs so// mnyam pa nyid la ni ma 'ongs pa'i dus mi dmigs so// mnyam pa
305b4(khri brgyad stong pa): nyid la ni da ltar byung ba'i dus mi dmigs te/ mnyam pa nyid la mnyam pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu
305b5(khri brgyad stong pa): phyin pa dmigs par lta ga la 'gyur/ rab 'byor tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu
305b6(khri brgyad stong pa): phyin pa ni sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' dang / da ltar byung ba'i dus rnams ni mi dmigs so// rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' dang / da ltar byung
305b7(khri brgyad stong pa): ba'i dus rnams ni mi dmigs so/ / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs te/ rab 'byor mnyam pa nyid la ni 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i dus
306a1(khri brgyad stong pa): mi dmigs so/ / mnyam pa nyid la mnyam pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu
306a2(khri brgyad stong pa): byin pa dmigs par lta ga la 'gyur/ rab 'byor gzhan yang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ni sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' dang / dbus rnams su mi dmigs so// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa
306a3(khri brgyad stong pa): rnams ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs so/ / rab 'byor mnyam pa nyid la ni 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i dus mi dmigs te/ mnyam pa nyid la mnyam
306a4(khri brgyad stong pa): pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs dang / da ltar byung ba'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dmigs par lta ga la 'gyur/ rab 'byor de bzhin du yang
306a5(khri brgyad stong pa): dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par
306a6(khri brgyad stong pa): rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad po dag ni sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyin ma'i mtha' dang / dbus rnams su mi dmigs so// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar ni
306a7(khri brgyad stong pa): dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs so/ / rab 'byor mnyam pa nyid la ni 'das pa'i dus mi dmigs/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus mi dmigs/ da ltar byung ba'i dus mi dmigs te/ mnyam pa nyid
306b1(khri brgyad stong pa): la mnyam pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dag dmigs par lta ga la 'gyur/ rab
306b2(khri brgyad stong pa): 'byor gzhan yang so so'i skye bo ni sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs so/ / so so'i skye bo ni phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// so so'i skye bo ni de ltar byung bar mi dmigs so// so so'i skye bo ni dus gsum//
306b3(khri brgyad stong pa): mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor sems can dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gzhan yang nyan thos ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// rang sangs
306b4(khri brgyad stong pa): rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ / de bzhin gshegs pa ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// de bzhin gshegs pa ni phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// de bzhin
306b5(khri brgyad stong pa): gshegs pa ni da ltar byung bar mi dmigs so/ / de bzhin gshes pa ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// rab
306b6(khri brgyad stong pa): 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar gnas te/ dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la de ltar bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs
306b7(khri brgyad stong pa): su rdzogs par bya'o/ / rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dus gsum mazham pa nyid ces bya ba'i theg pa chen po yin te/ de la gnas nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos
307a1(khri brgyad stong pa): / dums pa'i 'jig rten gyim kyis mam/ rnam pa bams pa mkhyen pa 'i sa par 'byung ba gyu ro// ma
307a2(khri brgyad stong pa): rtsu napa bya nga 'di na sa gas / / spyad sus rjes su ldan sa bya chu ma pa dpa sems dpa dzin pa rnas ngas b
307a3(khri brgyad stong pa): e nyid ces bgyi ba'i rig po chen po 'di legs par dka' stsal pa ni legs so legs so/ / bcom ldan 'das 'das pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis kyang zagapa
307a4(khri brgyad stong pa): chen po 'di la bslabs nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das ma 'ongs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang theg pa chen po 'di la
307a5(khri brgyad stong pa): tho ci rnam pa thams par mkhyen pa nyid rdzog par ban 'gyu ro/ / cos ldan 'das nga gad kyar phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi rnams dpag tu/ blangs mam // chas
307a6(khri brgyad stong pa): bA dag na mchis pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'i chen po dpag tu ma man+di/ zangs ma mchis/ na ma mchis pa de dag kyang theg pa chen po 'dril brlabs shing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
307a7(khri brgyad stong pa): nyid tho par bgyid 'ag / bcom ldan 'das de'i slangad du de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi theg pa chen po lags te/ 'di ltar dus gsum mnyam pa nyid ces
307b1(khri brgyad stong pa): ba'i theg pa lags so/ / de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rab 'byor de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/
307b2(khri brgyad stong pa): 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang theg pa chen po 'di la bslabs shing rnam pa thams
307b3(khri brgyad stong pa): cang mkhyen pa zhid brnyes so/ / brnyes par 'gyur ro// brnyes par mdzad do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad skyong pa las/ zil gyis gnon pa'i le'u zhes bya ste bcu dag pa'o//
307b4(khri brgyad stong pa): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa bam po bcu drug pa// / de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa byams ma'i bu gang pos 'di
307b5(khri brgyad stong pa): skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das gnas brtan rab 'byor ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i slad du bskul
307b6(khri brgyad stong pa): ba mdzad pas/ 'di ni theg pa chen po bstan par sems lags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das
307b7(khri brgyad stong pa): bdag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang 'gal bar theg pa chen po bstan pa 'am/ gcig tu ma gyur pa lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ltar gyur pa med
308a1(khri brgyad stong pa): deng rab 'byor khyod ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang mthun par theg pa chen po stong pa yin no/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di ltar nyan thos kyi chos rnams sam
308a2(khri brgyad stong pa): rang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams sam/ byang chub sems dpa'i chos rnams sam/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams sam/ dge ba'i chos gang ci'ang rung ba de dag thams cad ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par
308a3(khri brgyad stong pa): nang du 'dus shing yang dag par gzhol ba'i phyir ro/ / rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi chos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi chos dang / byang chub sems dpa'i
308a4(khri brgyad stong pa): chos dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i nang du 'dus shing yang dag par gzhol ba'i byang chub kyi phyogs kyi dge ba'i chos de dag gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
308a5(khri brgyad stong pa): bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub
308a6(khri brgyad stong pa): kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang /
308a7(khri brgyad stong pa): gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
308b1(khri brgyad stong pa): dang mas sa rgyal ba ldan pa / sem sa sa tu phyin pa dang / nan pa shegs pa ma / 'gas pa pa dang / la 'du dag par dag nga /
308b2(khri brgyad stong pa): byams pa chen po dang / rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / bsnyel ba mi mngara' ba'i chos nyid dngartag tu btang snyoms su gnas pa ste/
308b3(khri brgyad stong pa): rab 'byor de dag ni gan thos kyi chos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi chos dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ros dang / rangs rgyas kyi chos gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'i nang du 'dus
308b4(khri brgyad stong pa): shing yang dag par gzhol ba'i byang chub kyi phyogs kyi dge ba'i chos rnams yin no/ / rab 'byor de la theg pa chen po gang yin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang
308b5(khri brgyad stong pa): bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang
308b6(khri brgyad stong pa): yin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang / gzugs gang yin pa dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa gang yin pa dang / mig gang
308b7(khri brgyad stong pa): yin pa dang / gzugs gang yin pa dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa gang yin pa dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa gang yin pa dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba gang yin pa dang
309a1(khri brgyad stong pa): rna ba dang / sA dang / skye dang / lus dang / yid gang yin pa dang / chos rnams gang yin pa dang / med kyi rnam par shes pa gang yin pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa
309a2(khri brgyad stong pa): gang yin pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba gang yin pa dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang
309a3(khri brgyad stong pa): / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / lam rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag
309a4(khri brgyad stong pa): par rig pa rnams dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / 'dus byas kyi chos rnams dang / 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams dang / sdug bsngal ba dang // kun 'byung
309a5(khri brgyad stong pa): ba dang / 'gog pa dang / lam dang / 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs med pa'i khams gang yin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid
309a6(khri brgyad stong pa): stong pa nyid kyi bar gang yin pa dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams gang yin pa dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams gang yin pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dag gang yin pa dang /
309a7(khri brgyad stong pa): de bzhin gshegs pa gang yin pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba gang yin pa dang / chos kyi dbyings gang yin pa dang / de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /
309b1(khri brgyad stong pa): yang dag pa'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings gang yin pa dang / mya ngan las 'das pa gang yin pa'i chos de dag thams cad ni ldan pa 'ang ma yin/ mi ldan pa'ang ma yin/
309b2(khri brgyad stong pa): gzugs med pa/ bstan du med pa/ thogs pa med pa ste/ 'di ltar mtshan nyid med par mtshan nyid gcig pa yin pas/ rab 'byor rnam grangs des na khyod ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang
309b3(khri brgyad stong pa): mthun par theg pa chen po ston pa yin no/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor theg pa chen po'ang gzhan la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang gzhan/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa
309b4(khri brgyad stong pa): dang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'ang gzhan/ theg pa chen porang
309b5(khri brgyad stong pa): gzhan/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyang gzhan zhing / theg pa chen po'ang gzhan ma yin pa'i phyir te/ de ltar na theg pa chen po dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa de dag ni gnyis su med cing gnyis
309b6(khri brgyad stong pa): su dbyer med do/ / theg pa chen po'ang gzhan la/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dag kyang gzhan ma yin te/ de ltar na theg pa chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos de dag
309b7(khri brgyad stong pa): ni gnyis su med cing gnyis su dbyer med do/ / rab 'byor de'i phyir theg pa chen po bstan pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan par 'gyur ro// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pas
310a1(khri brgyad stong pa): theg pa chen po bstan par 'gyur ro/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar yang
310a2(khri brgyad stong pa): byang chub sems dpa' ni sngon gyi mabar khas mi len lags so/ / byang chub sems dpa' ni phyi ma'i mthar khas mi len lags so// byang chub sems dpar ni dbus su khas mi len lags so//
310a3(khri brgyad stong pa): bcom ldan 'das gzugs kun tu mtha' yas pa'i slad du/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bgyi'o// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes
310a4(khri brgyad stong pa): ba kun tu mtha' yas pa'i slad du/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gzugs byang chub sems dpa' zhes bgyi ba de lta bu'ang ma mchis
310a5(khri brgyad stong pa): shing mi dmigs lags so/ / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa byang chub sems dpa' zhes bgyi ba de lta bu'ang ma mchis shing mi dmigs lags so//
310a6(khri brgyad stong pa): bcom ldan 'das de ltar bdag gis thams cad kyi thams cad rnam pa thams cad kyi thams cad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang dag par rjes su ma mthong mi dmigs lags na
310a7(khri brgyad stong pa): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang zhig shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang la gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes brgya
310b1(khri brgyad stong pa): ba de ni ming tsam dubs lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ dper bgyin bdag ces bgyi'ang bdag mngon par grub pa ni gtan ma mchis lags so// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du byang
310b2(khri brgyad stong pa): chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa' zhes bgyi'ang byang chub sems dpa' mngon par grub pa ni gtan ma mchis lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das de ltar chos rnams rang bzhin ma mchis pa lags
310b3(khri brgyad stong pa): na/ gang mngon par grub pa'i gzugs de gang lags/ gang mngon par grub pa'i tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / gang mngon par grub pa'i rnam par shes pa

310b5(khri brgyad stong pa): pa ma lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das mngon par ma grub las gud na/ gang byang chub kyi slad du spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dmigs su ma mchis na/ ci mngon par ma grub pa de mngon par
310b6(khri brgyad stong pa): ma grub pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gdams par bgyi zhing / rjes su bstan par bgyi legs sam/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar bstan pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
310b7(khri brgyad stong pa): po'i sems mi zhum mi 'gong zhing / yid 'gyod par mi 'gyur la/ mi skrag mi dngang bar mi 'gyur na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa
311a1(khri brgyad stong pa): @lags par rig par bgyi'o/ / de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor car byar/
311a2(khri brgyad stong pa): byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar khas mi len pa yin/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mngar khas mi len pa yin/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su khas mi len pa yin/ tshe dang ldan pa
311a3(khri brgyad stong pa): rab 'byor ci'i phyir gzugs kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes

311a5(khri brgyad stong pa): mi dmigs pa yin/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu'ang med cing mi dmigs pa yin/ tshe dang ldan pa
311a6(khri brgyad stong pa): r ab 'byor ci'i phyir 'di skad du bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar bdag gis thams cad kyi thams cad rnam pa thams cad kyi thams cad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang dag par rjes su
311a7(khri brgyad stong pa): ma mthong mi dmigs lags na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang zhig shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang la gdams par bgyi zhing rjes su bstan par bgyi zhes smra/ tshe dang ldan pa rab
311b1(khri brgyad stong pa): 'byor ci'i phyir 'di skad du byang chub sems dpa' zhes bgyi ba de ni ming tsam du bgyi ba lags so zhes bya ba'i bar du smra/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir 'di skad du bcom ldan 'das dper bgyi na/ bdag
311b2(khri brgyad stong pa): bdag ces bgyi'ang bdag mngon par grub pa ni gtan ma mchis lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa' zhes bgyi rang byang chub sems dpa' mngon par
311b3(khri brgyad stong pa): grub pa ni gtan ma mchis lags so zhes smra/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir 'di skad du bcom ldan 'das de ltar chos rnams dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid lags na/ gang mngon par ma grub pa'i
311b4(khri brgyad stong pa): gzugs de gang lags/ gang mngon par ma grub pa'i tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / gang mngon par ma grub pa'i rnam par shes pa de gang lags/ gang mngon par ma grub
311b5(khri brgyad stong pa): pa de ni gzugs ma lags so/ / gang mngon par ma grub pa de ni tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ma lags so zhes smra/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i
311b6(khri brgyad stong pa): phyir 'di skad du ci mngon par ma grub pa de mngon par ma grub pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gdams par bgyi zhing / rjes su bstan par bgyi lags sam zhes smra/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor
311b7(khri brgyad stong pa): ci'i phyir 'di skad du bcom ldan 'das mngon par ma grub pa las gud na rang / byang chub kyi slad du spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dmigs su ma mchis lags so zhes smra
312a1(khri brgyad stong pa): tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir 'di skad du bcom ldan 'das gal te de ltar bstan pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems mi zhum mi 'gong zhing
312a2(khri brgyad stong pa): yid 'gyod par mi 'gyur la/ mi skrag mi dang shing dang bar mi 'gyur na// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa lags par rig par bgyi'o zhes sba/
312a3(khri brgyad stong pa): rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu sems can med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar khas mi len to// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu sems can stong pa'i phyir
312a4(khri brgyad stong pa): byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar khas mi len to/ / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu sems can dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar khas mi len to// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu
312a5(khri brgyad stong pa): sems can dngos po med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar khas mi len to// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzugs med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar khas mi len to//
312a6(khri brgyad stong pa): gzugs stong pa dang / gzugs dben pa dang / gzugs ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar khas mi len to// de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams
312a7(khri brgyad stong pa): dang / rnam par shes pa med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar khas mi len to// rnam par shes pa stong pa dang / rnam par shes pa dben pa dang / rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i
312b1(khri brgyad stong pa): phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar khas mi len to// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri bu sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar khas mi len to// sbyin par
312b2(khri brgyad stong pa): pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpar sngon gyi mthar khas mi len to//
312b3(khri brgyad stong pa): de bzhin du tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu
312b4(khri brgyad stong pa): phyin pa med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar khas mi len to// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu
312b5(khri brgyad stong pa): byin pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar khas mi len to// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di ltar stong pa nyid la sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i
312b6(khri brgyad stong pa): mtha' dang / dbus rnams mi dmigs te/ stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan zhing / sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' dang / dbus rnams kyang gzhan
312b7(khri brgyad stong pa): ma yin pas/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de ltar na stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' dang / dbus gang yin
313a1(khri brgyad stong pa): pa de dag thams cad ni gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med pa'i phyir ro/ / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam grangs des na byang chub sems dpar sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi mar
313a2(khri brgyad stong pa): mtha' dang / dbus rnams su khas mi len to// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu med pa'ang gzhan/ stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/ dben pa'ang gzhan/ ngo bo nyid med pa'ang gzhan/ byang chub sems
313a3(khri brgyad stong pa): dpa' yang gzhan/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'ang gzhan/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang gzhan/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'ang gzhan/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang
313a4(khri brgyad stong pa): gzhan/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang gzhan/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang gzhan zhing / sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' dang / dbus rnams kyang gzhan pa ma yin te/
313a5(khri brgyad stong pa): tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de ltar na med pa gang yin pa dang / stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / dben pa gang yin pa dang / ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang yin
313a6(khri brgyad stong pa): pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' dang / dbus rnams gang yin pa de dag thams cad ni gnyis su med cing gnyis su dbyer med do//
313a7(khri brgyad stong pa): tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam grangs des na byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' dang / dbus rnams su khas mi len to// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu nang stong pa nyid med
313b1(khri brgyad stong pa): pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar khas mi len to// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du med pa'i phyir// byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' dang /
313b2(khri brgyad stong pa): dbus rnams su khas mi len to// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu nang stong pa nyid med pa dang / nang stong pa nyid stong pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dben pa dang / rang stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid
313b3(khri brgyad stong pa): med pa la sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' dang / dbus rnams mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du med pa dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid
313b4(khri brgyad stong pa): stong pa dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dben pa dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' dang / dbus rnams mi dmigs pa'i
313b5(khri brgyad stong pa): phyir ro/ / nang stong pa nyid med pa dang / stong pa dang / dben pa dang / ngo bo nyid med pa'ang gzhan la/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du med pa dang / stong pa dang / dben pa dang /
313b6(khri brgyad stong pa): ngo bo nyid med pa'ang gzhan zhing / byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan la/ sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' dang / dbus rnams kyang gzhan pa ma yin te/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de ltar na nang
313b7(khri brgyad stong pa): stong pa nyid med pa dang / stong pa dang / dben pa dang / ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du med pa dang / stong pa dang / dben pa dang
314a1(khri brgyad stong pa): ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' dang / dbus rnams gang yin pa de dag thams cad ni gnyis
314a2(khri brgyad stong pa): su med cing gnyis su dbyer med do/ / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam grangs des na byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' dang / dbus rnams su khas mi len to// tshe dang
314a3(khri brgyad stong pa): ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' dang / dbus rnams su khas mi len to// dran pa nye bar
314a4(khri brgyad stong pa): gzhag pa rnams stong pa dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dben pa dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir// byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha'
314a5(khri brgyad stong pa): dang / dbus rnams su khas mi len to// de bzhin du yang dag par spong ba rnams med pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang /
314a6(khri brgyad stong pa): las dang / stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha'
314a7(khri brgyad stong pa): dang dbus rnams su khas mi len to/ / de bzhin du sbyar to// sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams stong pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams dben pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir/

314b2(khri brgyad stong pa): ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' dang / dbus rnams mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro// med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ stong pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ dben pa'ang gzhan ma yin//
314b3(khri brgyad stong pa): ngo bo nyid med pa'ang gzhan ma yin zhing / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyang gzhan ma yin la/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar du'ang gzhan ma yin zhing / sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i
314b4(khri brgyad stong pa): mtha' dang / dbus rnams kyang gzhan ma yin pa'i phyir te/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de ltar na dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams med pa dang / stong pa dang / dben pa dang / ngo bo nyid med
314b5(khri brgyad stong pa): pa gang yin pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi bar dang / sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' dang / dbus rnams gang yin pa de dag thams cad ni gnyis su med cing gnyis su dbyer
314b6(khri brgyad stong pa): med do/ / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam grangs des na byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' dang / dbus rnams su khas mi len to// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang
314b7(khri brgyad stong pa): ting nge 'dzin thams cad med pa dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad med pa dang / chos kyi dbyings med pa dang / de bzhin nyid med pa dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' med pa dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' stong pa
315a1(khri brgyad stong pa): dang rnga yang dag pa'i mtha' dben pa dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' dang / dbus rnams su khas
315a2(khri brgyad stong pa): mi len to/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin med pa dang / yang dag pa'i mtha'i bar du med pa dang / yang dag pa'i mtha'i bar du ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' dang / dbus
315a3(khri brgyad stong pa): rnams mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro/ / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu med pa'ang gzhan/ stong pa'ang gzhan/ dben pa'ang gzhan/ ngo bo nyid med pa'ang gzhan/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan/ yang dag
315a4(khri brgyad stong pa): pa'i mtha'i bar du'ang gzhan zhing / sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mnga' dang / dbus rnams kyang gzhan pa ma yin te/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de ltar na med pa gang yin pa dang / ngo bo nyid med pa'i
315a5(khri brgyad stong pa): pabar du gang yin pa dang / ting nge 'dzin gang yin pa dang / yang dag pa'i mtha'i bar dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' dang / dbus rnams gang yin pa dag ni
315a6(khri brgyad stong pa): thams cad kyi thams cad rnam pa thams cad kyi thams cad du gnyis su med cing gnyis su dbyer med do/ / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam grangs des na byang chub de pa'i sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi mi'i mtha'
315a7(khri brgyad stong pa): dang rngadabus rnams su khas mi len to/ / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang nyan thos med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' dang / dbus rnams su
315b1(khri brgyad stong pa): khas mi len to/ / nyan thos stong pa dang / nyan thos dben pa dang / nyan thos ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' dang / dbus rnams su khas
315b2(khri brgyad stong pa): mi len to/ / rang sangs rgyas med pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' med pa dang / rnam pa tham so cad mkhyen pa nyid med pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid stong pa dang / rnam pa thams cad
315b3(khri brgyad stong pa): mkhyen pa nyid dben pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' dang / dbus rnams su khas mi len to//

315b7(khri brgyad stong pa): rgyas de dag ni gnyis su med cing gnyis su dbyer med do/ / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam grangs des na byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' dang / dbus rnams su khas mi len
316a1(khri brgyad stong pa): tong tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu khyod gang 'di skad du tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir gzugs kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par
316a2(khri brgyad stong pa): rig par bya/ / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya zhes zer ba ni/
316a3(khri brgyad stong pa): tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzugs ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa yin no// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/
316a4(khri brgyad stong pa): tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di lta ste/ dper na nam mkha' la ni mtha' dang / dbus dang / tha ma mi dmigs kyang nam mkha' zhes tha snyan 'dogs so// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de bzhin du gzugs
316a5(khri brgyad stong pa): stong pa nyid yin pa'i phyir/ gzugs kyi sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs te/ stong pa nyid la ni mtha' 'am dbus dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// che dang
316a6(khri brgyad stong pa): ldan pa shA ri'i bu de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid yin pa'i phyir/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par
316a7(khri brgyad stong pa): shes pa'i sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ba'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs te/ stong pa nyid la ni mtha' 'am dbus dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam
316b1(khri brgyad stong pa): grangs des na gzugs kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya'o// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa kun
316b2(khri brgyad stong pa): tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de bzhin du khams dang / skye mched rnams dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang /
316b3(khri brgyad stong pa): yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa
316b4(khri brgyad stong pa): dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di lta ste/ dper na mtha' yas mu med pa'i phyir/ nam
316b5(khri brgyad stong pa): mkha' mtha' 'am/ dbus mi dmigs kyang nam mkha' zhes tha snyad 'dogs so// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar du stong pa nyid yin pa'i phyir/
316b6(khri brgyad stong pa): sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la mtha' 'am dbus mi dmigs te/ stong pa nyid la mtha' 'am dbus dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam grangs des na sangs rgyas kyi
316b7(khri brgyad stong pa): chos rnams kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa'i kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gang yang khyod 'di skad du tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir
317a1(khri brgyad stong pa): gzugs byang chub sems dpar zhes bya ba de lta bu'ang med cing mi dmigs pa yin/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa byang chub
317a2(khri brgyad stong pa): sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu'ang med cing mi dmigs pa yin nam zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzugs ni gzugs kyis stong ngo // tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu tshor ba dang / 'du shes
317a3(khri brgyad stong pa): dang rnga 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ni rnam par shes pas stong ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu stong pa nyid la ni gzugs med cing mi dmigs so// stong pa nyid la ni byang
317a4(khri brgyad stong pa): chub sems dpa' med cing mi dmigs la/ / de bzhin du stong pa nyid la ni tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ni med cing mi dmigs/ stong pa nyid la ni byang
317a5(khri brgyad stong pa): chub sems dpa' med cing mi dmigs pa'i phyir te/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam grangs des na gzugs byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu'ang med cing mi dmigs pa yin no// tshor ba dang /
317a6(khri brgyad stong pa): 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu'ang med cing mi dmigs pa yin no// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni
317a7(khri brgyad stong pa): sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas stong ngo / / de bzhin du tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang //
317b1(khri brgyad stong pa): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas stong ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu stong pa nyid la ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med cing / stong pa nyid la ni byang chub sems
317b2(khri brgyad stong pa): dpa' med pa'i phyir ro/ / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu nang stong pa nyid ni nang stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo // dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar
317b3(khri brgyad stong pa): gyis stong ngo / / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ni dran pa nye bar gzhag rnams kyis stong ngo // yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs
317b4(khri brgyad stong pa): rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / lam rnams dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa
317b5(khri brgyad stong pa): rnams ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyis stong ngo / / chos kyi dbyings kyis stong ngo // de bzhin nyid ni de bzhin nyid kyis stong ngo // yang dag pa'i mtha' ni yang dag pa'i mthas stong ngo //

324a2(khri brgyad stong pa): 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ byang chub sems dpa' gtan med cing mi dmigs na/ de mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
324a3(khri brgyad stong pa): rgyas gtar med cing mi dmigs na/ de mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod de/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam grangs des na bdag bdag ces bya'ang bdag mngon par grub pa ni gtan med pa
324a4(khri brgyad stong pa): yin no/ / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang khyod 'di skad du ci'i phyir chos thams cad dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid lags na zhes smra zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de de bzhin
324a5(khri brgyad stong pa): no/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di ltar 'dus pa las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir ro// shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gang gi 'dus pa las byung ba'i ngo
324a6(khri brgyad stong pa): nyid med/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzugs kyi 'dus pa las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med do// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i 'dus
324a7(khri brgyad stong pa): pa las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med do/ / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu mig gi 'dus pa las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med do// de bzhin du rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi 'dus pa las byung ba'i
324b1(khri brgyad stong pa): / ngo bo nyid med do// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de bzhin du gzugs dang / spa dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya dang / chos rnams dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus
324b2(khri brgyad stong pa): yid kyi rnam par shes pa dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / rna ba dang /
324b3(khri brgyad stong pa): sA dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'i 'dus pa las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med do// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'dus pa las byung ba'i
324b4(khri brgyad stong pa): ngo bo nyid med do/ / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol
324b5(khri brgyad stong pa): phyin pa'i 'dus pa las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med de/ / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam grangs des na chos thams cad ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid yin no// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang chos thas
324b6(khri brgyad stong pa): cad ni mi rtag pa ste/ gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no// shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor chos thams cad ni mi rtag pa ste/ gang dang yang bral bas ma yin pa gang yin// rab 'gror
324b7(khri brgyad stong pa): gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzugs ni mi rtag pa ste/ gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang
325a1(khri brgyad stong pa): rnam par shes pa ni mi rtag pa ste/ gang dang dang bral bas ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di ltar mi rtag pa gang yin pa de ni zad pa'i dngos po
325a2(khri brgyad stong pa): med pa'o/ / de bzhin du chos thams cad ni sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag med pa dang / zhi ba dang / stong pa dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa ste/ gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no// de
325a3(khri brgyad stong pa): ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di ltar smon pa med pa gang yin de ni zad pa'i dngos po med pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de bzhin du chos thams cad ni dge ba dang / kha na ma tho ba
325a4(khri brgyad stong pa): med pa dang / zag pa med pa dang / nyon mongs pa med pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa dang / rnam par byang ba dang / 'dus ma byas pa ste/ gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no// de ci'i phyir
325a5(khri brgyad stong pa): zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di ltar 'dus ma byas pa gang yin pa de ni zad pa'i dngos po med pa'i phyir te/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam grangs des na chos thams cad ni ngo bo nyid med pa ste/ gang
325a6(khri brgyad stong pa): dang yang bral bas ma yin no/ / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang chos thams cad ni ther zug tu gnas pa ma yin/ 'jig pa ma yin no// shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i
325a7(khri brgyad stong pa): phyir chos thams cad ther zug tu gnas pa ma yin/ 'jig pa ma yin/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzugs ni ther zug tu gnas pa ma yin/ 'jig pa ma yin no// de
325b1(khri brgyad stong pa): ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir ro// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ni ther gzutu gnas pa ma yin/ 'jig pa
325b2(khri brgyad stong pa): ma yin no/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir ro// de bzhin du dge ba dang / mi dge ba dang / kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa dang / kha na ma tho ba med pa dang / zag pa dang bcas pa dang
325b3(khri brgyad stong pa): zag pa med pa dang / nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa dang / nyon mongs pa med pa dang / 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa dang / 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas dang / kun nas nyon
325b4(khri brgyad stong pa): mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba'i chos rnams dang / 'khor ba dang / mya ngan las 'das pa'ang ther zug tu gnas pa ma yin/ 'jig pa ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i rang bzhin de
325b5(khri brgyad stong pa): yin pa'i phyir te/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam grangs des na chos thams cad ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid yin no// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gang yang khyod 'di skad du/ ci'i phyir gang mngon
325b6(khri brgyad stong pa): par grub pa'i gzugs de gang lags/ gang mngon par grub pa'i tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / gang mngon par grub pa'i rnam par shes pade gang lags shes smra zhes zer

326a1(khri brgyad stong pa): pa'o/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di ltar mngon par 'du byed pa po med pa'i phyir ro// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu mig ni mngon par 'dus ma byas
326a2(khri brgyad stong pa): pa'o/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar mngon par 'du byed pa po med pa'i phyir ro// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de bzhin du rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid ni mngon par 'dus ma byas pa'o//

326a4(khri brgyad stong pa): byas pa'o/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar mngon par 'du byed pa po mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro// chos thams cad kyi bar du'ang mngon par 'dus ma byas pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar mngon par 'du
326a5(khri brgyad stong pa): byed pa po mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro/ / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam grangs des na gzugs dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa rnams ni mngon par ma grub pa
326a6(khri brgyad stong pa): zhes bya'o/ / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gang yang khyod 'di skad du ci'i phyir gang mngon par ma grub pa de gzugs ma lags/ gang mngon par ma grub pa de tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams
326a7(khri brgyad stong pa): dang / rnam par shes pa ma lags zhes smra zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de de bzhin te/ de de bzhin no// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di ltar gzugs ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ rang bzhin gyis stong pa
326b1(khri brgyad stong pa): gang yin pa de la skye ba med cing 'jig pa med do/ / skye ba med cing 'jig pa med pa gang yin pa de la gzhan du 'gyur ba med do// de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam

326b3(khri brgyad stong pa): cad kyi bar du rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ gang dag rang bzhin gyis stong pa de dag la skye ba med cing 'jig pa med do// gang dag la skye ba med cing 'jig pa med pa de dag la gzhan du 'gyur ba med de/ rnam grangs des na
326b4(khri brgyad stong pa): gang mngon par ma grub pa de ni gzugs ma yin no/ / gang mngon par ma grub pa de ni tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gang yang khyod 'di
326b5(khri brgyad stong pa): skad du ci'i phyir/ ci mngon par ma grub pa de mngon par ma grub pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gdams par bgyi zhing rjes su bstan par bgyi lags sam zhes smra zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa
326b6(khri brgyad stong pa): shA ri'i bu 'di ltar mngon par ma grub pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de ni mngon par ma grub pa ste/ de ltar nangon par ma grub pa dang / shes
326b7(khri brgyad stong pa): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de ni gnyis su med cing gnyis su dbyer med de/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam grangs des ma kho bos 'di skad du ci mngon par ma grub pa de mngon par ma grub pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lag sa
327a1(khri brgyad stong pa): par bgyi zhing rjes su bstan par bgyi lags sam zhes smras so/ / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gang yang khyod 'di skad du ci'i phyir mngon par ma grub pa las gud na'ang / gang yang byang
327a2(khri brgyad stong pa): chub kyi slad du spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dmigs su ma mchis lags so zhes smra zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
327a3(khri brgyad stong pa): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/ mngon par ma grub pa'ang gzhan la/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ de ltar na mngon par ma grub pa dang / byang chub
327a4(khri brgyad stong pa): sems dpa' zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su med cing gnyis su dbyer med do/ / mngon par ma grub pa las gud na gzugs yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / mngon par ma grub pa las gud na tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du
327a5(khri brgyad stong pa): byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ de ltar na mngon par ma grub pa dang / gzugs de ni gnyis su med cing gnyis su dbyer med do// de ltar na mngon par ma grub pa dang / tshor
327a6(khri brgyad stong pa): ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa de ni gnyis su med cing gnyis su dbyer med do// de bzhin du mngon par ma grub pa las gud na chos thams cad kyi bar du yang dag par rjes
327a7(khri brgyad stong pa): su ma mthong ste/ de ltar na mngon par ma grub pa dang / chos thams cad kyi bar de ni gnyis su med cing gnyis su dbyer med de/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam grangs des na mngon par ma grub pa
327b1(khri brgyad stong pa): las gud na gang byang chub kyi phyir spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dmigs su med pa yin no/ / / shes rab kyi pha rol tu sbyin pa khri brgyad stong pa'am po bcu
327b2(khri brgyad stong pa): bdun pa/ / // tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gang yang khyod 'di skad du ci'i phyir gal te de ltar bstan pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems mi zhum mi gong zhing /
327b3(khri brgyad stong pa): yid 'gyod par mi 'gyur la/ mi skrag mi dngang zhing dngang bar mi 'gyur na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa lags par rig par bgyi'o zhes smra zhes
327b4(khri brgyad stong pa): zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni chos thams cad g.yo ba med par yang dag par rjes su mthong zhing / chos thams cad rmi lam lta bu dang / sgyu ma lta bu
327b5(khri brgyad stong pa): dang / smig rgyu lta bu dang / brag cha lta bu dang / mig yor lta bu dang / gzugs brnyan lta bu dang / sprul pa lta bur yang dag par rjes su mthong ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam grangs des na byang chub sems dpa' sems
327b6(khri brgyad stong pa): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni bstan pa 'di thos na/ mi skrag mi dngang zhing dngang bar mi 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis
327b7(khri brgyad stong pa): 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das gang gi tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / chos de dag la de ltar nye bar rtog pa
328a1(khri brgyad stong pa): de'i tshe/ gzugs khas mi len cing mi 'dzin la gnas par mi 'gyid de/ mngon par zhen par mi 'gyid cing / 'di ni gzugs so zhes 'dogs par mi bgyid lags so//
328a2(khri brgyad stong pa): de'i tshe tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa khas mi len cing mi 'dzin la gnas par mi 'gyid de/ mngon par zhen par mi 'gyid cing / 'di ni rnam
328a3(khri brgyad stong pa): par shes pa'o zhes 'dogs par mi bgyid lags so/ / de bzhin du de'i tshe mig khas mi len cing mi 'dzin la gnas par mi bgyid de/ mngon par zhen par mi 'gyid cing / 'di ni mig go zhes 'dog
328a4(khri brgyad stong pa): bar mi bgyid lags so/ / de bzhin du de'i tshe rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid khas mi len cing mi 'dzin la gnas par mi bgyid de/ mngon par zhen par mi 'gyid cing //
328a5(khri brgyad stong pa): 'di ni yid do zhes 'dogs par mi 'gyid lags so// de'i tshe sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa khrus mi len cing mi 'dzin la gnas par mi 'gyid de/ mngon par zhen par mi 'gyid cing / 'di ni
328a6(khri brgyad stong pa): sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o zhes 'dogs par mi bgyid lags so/ / de bzhin du de'i tshe tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi
328a7(khri brgyad stong pa): rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khas mi len cing mi 'dzin la gnas par mi 'gyid de/ mngon par zhen par mi bgyid cing / 'di
328b1(khri brgyad stong pa): ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o zhes 'dogs par mi bgyid lags so/ / de'i tshe nang stong pa nyid khas mi len cing mi 'dzin la gnas pa mi bgyid de/ mngon par zhen par ma bgyid cing
328b2(khri brgyad stong pa): 'di ni nang stong pa nyid do zhes 'dogs par mi bgyid lags so/ / de bzhin du de'i tshe dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du khas mi len cing mi 'dzin la gnas par mi 'gyid de/ mngon
328b3(khri brgyad stong pa): par zhen par mi bgyid cing / 'di ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do zhes 'dogs par mi bgyid lags so// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
328b4(khri brgyad stong pa): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams khas mi len cing mi 'dzin la gnas par mi 'gyid de/ mngon par zhen par mi bgyid cing / 'di ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa
328b5(khri brgyad stong pa): rnams so zhes 'dogs par mi 'gyid lags so/ / de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' de'i tshe yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang
328b6(khri brgyad stong pa): stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams
328b7(khri brgyad stong pa): dang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad khas mi len cing mi 'dzin la gnas par mi 'gyid de/ mngon par zhen par mi bgyid cing / 'di dag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams
329a1(khri brgyad stong pa): so zhes 'dogs par mi bgyid lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni
329a2(khri brgyad stong pa): ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad khas mi len cing mi 'dzin la gnas par mi 'gyid de/ mngon par zhen par mi bgyid cing / 'di dag ni ting nge 'dzin dang /
329a3(khri brgyad stong pa): gzungs kyi sgo rnams so zhes 'dogs par mi 'gyid lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu
329a4(khri brgyad stong pa): phyin pa la spyod pa ni/ gzungs yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / de bzhin du phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched rnams yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos
329a5(khri brgyad stong pa): sum cu rtsa bdun yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / rnams pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi
329a6(khri brgyad stong pa): bar du yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba'i slad du'o/ / de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar gzugs ni ma skyes pa ste/ gzugs kyi skye ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de gzugs ma lags
329a7(khri brgyad stong pa): pa'i slad du'o/ / de ltar na gzugs dang skye ba ma mchis pa de gnyis su ma mchis shing gnyis su dbyer ma mchis lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar skye ba
329b1(khri brgyad stong pa): ma mchis pa ni gcig ma lags/ mang po ma lags pa'i slad du'o// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i skye ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de ni rnam
329b2(khri brgyad stong pa): par shes pa ma lags so/ / mig gi skye ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de ni mig ma lags so// rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi skye ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de ni
329b3(khri brgyad stong pa): yid ma lags so/ / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i skye ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma lags so// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu
329b4(khri brgyad stong pa): byin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i skye ba ma mchis pa gang lags de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu
329b5(khri brgyad stong pa): phyin pa ma lags pa'i slad du'o/ / de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / skye ba ma mchis pa de ni gnyis su ma mchis shing gnyis su dbyer ma mchis lags so// nang stong pa nyid kyi skye ba
329b6(khri brgyad stong pa): ma mchis pa gang lags pa de ni nang stong pa nyid ma lags so/ / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong bkyi bar gyi skye ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma lags te/
329b7(khri brgyad stong pa): de ltar na dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / skye ba ma mchis pa de ni gnyis su ma mchis shing gnyis su dbyer ma mchis lags so// bcom ldan 'das dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams
330a1(khri brgyad stong pa): kyi skye ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ma lags te/ de ltar na dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dang / skye ba ma mchis pa de ni gnyis su
330a2(khri brgyad stong pa): ma mchis shing gnyis su dbyer ma mchis lags so/ / de bzhin du yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang
330a3(khri brgyad stong pa): lam dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / stobs bcu dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi skye ba ma
330a4(khri brgyad stong pa): mchis pa gang lags pa de dag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ma lags te/ de ltar na sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams dang / skye ba ma mchis pa de ni gnyis su ma mchis shing gnyis su dbyer ma mchis
330a5(khri brgyad stong pa): lags so/ / de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi skye ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de dag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ma lags pa'i slad du'o// bcom ldan 'das
330a6(khri brgyad stong pa): 'di ltar de bzhin nyid ni ma skyes pa ste/ de bzhin nyid kyi skye ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de ni de bzhin nyid ma lags te/ de ltar na de bzhin nyid dang / skye ba ma mchis pa de ni gnyis
330a7(khri brgyad stong pa): su ma mchis shing gnyis su dper ma mchis lags so/ / de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar skye ba ma mchis pa ni gcig ma lags/ mang po ma lags pa'i slad du ste/
330b1(khri brgyad stong pa): de'i slad du de bzhin nyid kyi skye ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de ni de bzhin nyid ma lags so// ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang /
330b2(khri brgyad stong pa): chos gnas pa nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings kyi skye ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings ma lags so//
330b3(khri brgyad stong pa): de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings dang / skye ba ma mchis pa de ni gnyis su ma mchis shing gnyis su dbyer ma mchis pa'i slad du'o// bcom ldan pa das byang chub dang / rnam pa
330b4(khri brgyad stong pa): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi skye ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma lags te/ de ltar na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang / skye ba ma mchis pa de ni gnyis su ma mchis
330b5(khri brgyad stong pa): shing gnyis su dbyer ma mchis lags so/ / de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar skye ba ma mchis pa ni gcig ma lags/ mang po ma lags pa'i slad du ste/ de'i slad du rnam pa thams cad mche
330b6(khri brgyad stong pa): pa nyid dang / skye ba ma mchis pa de ni gnyis su ma mchis shing gnyis su dbyer ma mchis lags so// bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar gzugs ni mi rtag pa ste/ gzugs kyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni gzugs
330b7(khri brgyad stong pa): ma lags so/ / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni rnam par shes pa ma lags te/ de ltar na phung po rnams dang / 'grib pa de ni gnyis
331a1(khri brgyad stong pa): sum mchis gang gnyis su dbyer ma mchis lags so/ / de co'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di skar 'thab pa gcigs 'anas/ mang po ma lags pa'i slad du'o/
331a2(khri brgyad stong pa): khams dang / skye mched rnams kyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de dag ni khams dang / skye mched rnams ma lags te/ de ltar na khams dang / skye mched rnams dang / 'grib pa de ni gnyis sum
331a3(khri brgyad stong pa): mchis shing gnyis su dbyer ma mchis lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma lags te/ de ltar na sbyin pa'i pha rol
331a4(khri brgyad stong pa): tu phyin pa dang / 'grib pa de ni gnyis su ma mchis shing gnyi su dbyer ma mchis lags so// de bzhin du tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha
331a5(khri brgyad stong pa): rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma lags te/ de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang
331a6(khri brgyad stong pa): 'grib pa de ni gnyis su ma mchis shing gnyis su dbyer ma mchis lags so/ / de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar bgrib pa ni gcig ma lags/ mang po ma lags pa'i slad du ste/ de'i slad du shes
331a7(khri brgyad stong pa): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das nang stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni nang stong pa nyid ma lags te/ de ltar
331b1(khri brgyad stong pa): na nang stong pa nyid dang / 'grib pa de ni gnyis su ma mchis shing gnyis su dbyer ma mchis lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar 'grib pa ni gcig ma lags/ mang po ma lags pa'i
331b2(khri brgyad stong pa): slad du ste/ de'i slad du nang stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni nang stong pa nyid ma lags so// de bzhin du dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni dngos po med pa'i ngo
331b3(khri brgyad stong pa): nyid stong pa nyid ma lags te/ de ltar na dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / 'grib pa de ni gnyis su ma mchis shing gnyis su dbyer ma mchis lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan
331b4(khri brgyad stong pa): bdas 'di ltar 'grib pa ni gcig ma lags/ mang po ma lags pa'i slad du ste/ de'i slad du dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang lags de ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma
331b5(khri brgyad stong pa): lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ma lags te/ de ltar na dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dang / 'grib
331b6(khri brgyad stong pa): ba de ni gnyis su ma mchis shing gnyis su dbyer ma mchis lags so/ / de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar 'grib pa ni gcig ma lags mang po ma lags pa'i slad du ste/
331b7(khri brgyad stong pa): de'i slad du dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams mi lags so// yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi nang pa rnams dang / dbang
332a1(khri brgyad stong pa): rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i 'grib pa gang lags de ni lam ma lags te/ de ltar na
332a2(khri brgyad stong pa): dang 'grib pa de ni gnyis su ma mchis shing gnyis su dbyer ma mchis lags so/ / de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar 'grib pa ni gcig ma lags/ mang po ma lags pa'i slad du ste
332a3(khri brgyad stong pa): de'i slad du lam gyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni lam ma lags so/ / de bzhin du mngon par shes pa rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / stobs bcu dang
332a4(khri brgyad stong pa): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de dag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ma lags te/ de ltar na sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dre ba rnams dang / 'grib
332a5(khri brgyad stong pa): pa de ni gnyis su ma mchis shing gnyis su dbyer ma mchis lags so/ / de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar 'grib pa ni gcig ma lags/ mang po ma lags pa'i slad du ste/ de'i slad du
332a6(khri brgyad stong pa): / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das gang yang gzugs shes bgyi ba de ni gnyis su ma mchis pa'i grangs
332a7(khri brgyad stong pa): su bgyis pa lags so/ / de bzhin du gang yang tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa zhes bgyi ba de ni gnyis su ma mchis pa'i grangs su bgyis pa lags so// gang yang rnam pa thaH/
332b1(khri brgyad stong pa): cad mkhyen pa nyid ces bgyi ba'i bar de'ang gnyis su ma mchis pa'i grangs su bgyis pa lags so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa las/ gnyis su med pa'i le'u zhes bya
332b2(khri brgyad stong pa): ste nyi shu pa'o/ / / de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
332b3(khri brgyad stong pa): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa chos 'di dag la ni ji ltar nye bar rtog/ / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'thor byang chub sems dpa' ni gang yin/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gang yin/ nye bar rtog pa ni
332b4(khri brgyad stong pa): gang yin/ rab 'thor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gang khyod 'di skad du byang chub sems dpa' ni gang yin zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu zung chub gang yin pa nyid sems dpa'
332b5(khri brgyad stong pa): yin pas/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya'o// byang chub des kyang chos thams cad kyi rnam pa shes te/ chos de dag la mngon par zhen pa'ang med do// chos gang dag de rnam pa shes she na/
332b6(khri brgyad stong pa): gzugs kyi rnam pa shes te/ de la'ang mngon par zhen pa med do// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i rnam pa shes te/ de la'ang mngon par zhen pa
332b7(khri brgyad stong pa): med do/ / de bzhin du khams rnams dang / skye mched rnams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa 'dun gyi rnam pa shes te/ de la'ang mngon par
333a1(khri brgyad stong pa): zhen pa med do/ / stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos la 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi rnam pa te/
333a2(khri brgyad stong pa): da la'ang mngon par zhen pa med do// shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor chos thams cad kyi rnam pa gang yin/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam pa gang dag dang /
333a3(khri brgyad stong pa): rtags gang dag dang / mtshan ma gang dag gis chos rnams 'dzin pa ste/ 'di lta ste/ rnam pa gang dag dang / rtags gang dag dang / mtshan ma gang dag gis 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas kyi chos
333a4(khri brgyad stong pa): rnams sam/ gzugs rnams sam/ sgra rnams sam/ dri rnams sam/ ro rnams sam/ reg bya rnams sam/ chos rnams sam/ nang dang phyi'i chos rnams su 'dzin pa ste/ de ni chos
333a5(khri brgyad stong pa): thams cad kyi rnam pa zhes bya'o/ / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gang yang khyod 'di skad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gang yin zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gang la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
333a6(khri brgyad stong pa): pa zhes bya ba de ni ring du song ba ste/ de'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya'o// gang las ring du song zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu phung po rnams dang / khams rnams dang / skye mched
333a7(khri brgyad stong pa): rnams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba las ring du song / nyon mongs pa thams cad dang / lta bar gyur pa thams cad las ring du song / 'gro ba drug las ring du song ba ste/ de'i phyir ring du song ba zhes
333b1(khri brgyad stong pa): bya'o/ / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa las ring du
333b2(khri brgyad stong pa): song ba ste/ de'i phyir ring du song ba zhes bya'o// nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar pa'i du song ba ste/ de'i phyir ring du song ba zhes bya'o// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dang /
333b3(khri brgyad stong pa): yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa las ring du
333b4(khri brgyad stong pa): song ba ste/ de'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ring du song ba zhes bya'o// stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa
333b5(khri brgyad stong pa): bco brgyad po dag las ring du song ba ste/ de'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ring du song ba zhes bya'o// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar las ring du song ba ste/ de'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin/
333b6(khri brgyad stong pa): pab 'di ring du song ba zhes bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam grangs des na/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni ring du song ba zhes bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gang yang khyod 'di skad du nye
333b7(khri brgyad stong pa): bar rtog pa ni gang yin zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni gzugs rtag ces bya ba dang / mi rtag ces bya bar nyes
334a1(khri brgyad stong pa): mi rtog go/ / gzugs bde zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya bar nye bar mi rtog go/ gzugs bdad ces bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya bar nye bar mi rtog go// gzugs zhi zhes
334a2(khri brgyad stong pa): bya ba dang / ma zhi zhes bya bar nye bar mi rtog go// gzugs stong zhes bya ba dang / mi stong zhes bya bar nye bar mi rtog go// gzugs mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya bar nye bar mi rtog go/
334a3(khri brgyad stong pa): gzugs smon pa yod ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya bar nye bar mi rtog go// gzugs dben zhes bya ba dang / mi dben zhes bya bar nye bar mi rtog go// de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du
334a4(khri brgyad stong pa): byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa rtag ces bya ba dang / mi rtag ces bya bar nye bar mi rtog go// rnam par shes pa bde zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya bar nye bar mi rtog go// rnam par shes pa bdag ces
334a5(khri brgyad stong pa): bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya bar nye bar mi rtog go/ rnam par shes pa zhi zhes bya ba dang / ma zhi zhes bya bar nye bar mi rtog go/ rnam par shes pa stong zhes bya ba dang / mi stong zhes bya bar nye bar mi rtog go//
334a6(khri brgyad stong pa): rnam par shes pa mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya bar nye bar mi rtog go/ rnam par shes pa smon pa yod ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya bar nye bar mi rtog go/ rnam par shes pa
334a7(khri brgyad stong pa): dben zhes bya ba dang / mi dben zhes bya bar nye bar mi rtog go// de bzhin du sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus
334b1(khri brgyad stong pa): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rtag ces bya ba dang / mi rtag ces bya bar nye bar mi rtog go// de bzhin du sbyar te/ shes rab kyi pha rol
334b2(khri brgyad stong pa): tu phyin pa la bde zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / ma zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mi stong zhes
334b3(khri brgyad stong pa): bya ba dang / mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa yod ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya ba dang / mi dben zhes bya bar nye bar mi rtog go/

334b5(khri brgyad stong pa): mi rtog go/ / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid stong zhes bya ba dang / mi stong zhes bya bar nye bar mi rtog go// dben zhes bya ba dang / mi dben zhes bya ba'i bar du nye bar mi rtog go// de bzhin du dran pa nye
334b6(khri brgyad stong pa): babar gzhag pa rnams rtag ces bya ba dang / mi rtag ces bya bar nye bar mi rtog go// de bzhin du sbyar te/ yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang /

335a1(khri brgyad stong pa): #/ rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rtag ces bya ba dang / mi rtag ces
335a2(khri brgyad stong pa): byabar nye bar mi rtog go/ / bde zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / ma zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mi
335a3(khri brgyad stong pa): stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa yod ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya ba dang / mi dben zhes bya bar nye bar mi rton
335a4(khri brgyad stong pa): ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni/ chos de dag la de ltar nye bar rtog par byed do// shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan
335a5(khri brgyad stong pa): pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir khyod 'di skad du/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar gzugs kyi ma skyes pa gang lags pa de ni gzugs ma lags so// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes
335a6(khri brgyad stong pa): paba'i ma skyes pa gang lags pa de ni rnam par shes pa ma lags so/ / de bzhin du khams dang / skye mched rnams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang / stong pa nyid thams cad
335a7(khri brgyad stong pa): / dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / sangs
335b1(khri brgyad stong pa): rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi skye ba ma mchis la gang lags pa de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma lags so zhes smra/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang
335b2(khri brgyad stong pa): ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzugs ni gzugs kyis stong ngo / / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i gzugs kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni gzugs ma yin te skye ba med do// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam grangs des na gzugs kyi
335b3(khri brgyad stong pa): skye ba med pa gang yin pa de ni gzugs ma yin no/ / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ni rnam par shes pas stong ngo // tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu
335b4(khri brgyad stong pa): rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni rnam par shes pa ma yin te skye ba med do/ / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam grangs des na rnam par shes pa'i skye ba med pa gang yin pa de ni rnam par shes pa ma yin
335b5(khri brgyad stong pa): / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas stong ngo // sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin te skye ba med do// tshe dang ldan
335b6(khri brgyad stong pa): pa shA ri'i bu de bzhin du tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi phyi rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni
335b7(khri brgyad stong pa): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas stong ngo / / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin te skye ba med do// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam grangs des na shes
336a1(khri brgyad stong pa): rab kyi pha rob tu phyin pa'i sgru ba med pa ga dzin pa de ni sa rab kyi rab tu phyin pa yin no/ / tshe dang ldan pa shA ra'i than stong parjid ni nang stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo // nang stong pa nyid
336a2(khri brgyad stong pa): stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni nang stong pa nyid ma yin te skye ba med do/ / dngos po med 'amatsha ba nyid stong pa nyid kyi khar ni dngos po med pa'i ngom nyid stong pa nyid kyis spyong ngo // dngas po med pa'i ngo na nyid stong
336a3(khri brgyad stong pa): pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma yin te skye ba med do/ / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam grangs des na dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi skye ba med pa
336a4(khri brgyad stong pa): gang yin pa de ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma yin no/ / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyis stong ngo // dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi stong pa

336a6(khri brgyad stong pa): lag dang / lam dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i
